TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class Array : ICloneable, System.Collections.IList, System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable

.class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit Array extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList, class System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, class System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable, class System.ICloneable
Public MustInherit Class Array Implements ICloneable, IList, IStructuralComparable, IStructuralEquatable
public ref class Array abstract : ICloneable, System::Collections::IList, System::Collections::IStructuralComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable

summary.span: 提供建立、管理、搜尋和排序陣列的方法，可在 Common Language Runtime 時做為所有陣列的基底類別。

span.span: Provides methods for creating, manipulating, searching, and sorting arrays, thereby serving as the base class for all arrays in the common language runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別不是屬於命名空間。The class is not part of the namespaces. 不過，它仍然是集合因為它根據介面。However, it is still considered a collection because it is based on the interface. 類別是支援陣列的語言實作的基底類別。The class is the base class for language implementations that support arrays. 不過，只有系統和編譯器可以明確地從衍生類別。However, only the system and compilers can derive explicitly from the class. 使用者應該使用的語言所提供的陣列建構。Users should employ the array constructs provided by the language. 項目是中的值。An element is a value in an . 長度是它可以包含的元素總數。The length of an is the total number of elements it can contain. 下限為是其第一個元素的索引。The lower bound of an is the index of its first element. 可以有任何下限，但其下限為零的預設值。An can have any lower bound, but it has a lower bound of zero by default. 建立的執行個體時，就可以定義其他下限類別使用。多維度可以有不同的繫結，每個維度。A different lower bound can be defined when creating an instance of the class using .A multidimensional can have different bounds for each dimension. 陣列可以有 32 個維度的最大值。An array can have a maximum of 32 dimensions. 不同於在類別命名空間，具有固定的容量。Unlike the classes in the namespaces, has a fixed capacity. 若要增加容量，您必須建立新物件具有所需容量，請複製項目從舊物件到新的專案，並刪除舊。To increase the capacity, you must create a new object with the required capacity, copy the elements from the old object to the new one, and delete the old . 根據預設，最大為 2 gb (GB)。By default, the maximum size of an is 2 gigabytes (GB). 在 64 位元環境中，您可以避免大小限制，藉由設定`enabled`屬性[gcAllowVeryLargeObjects](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcallowverylargeobjects-element.md)組態項目`true`在執行階段環境中。In a 64-bit environment, you can avoid the size restriction by setting the `enabled` attribute of the [gcAllowVeryLargeObjects](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcallowverylargeobjects-element.md) configuration element to `true` in the run-time environment. 不過，陣列仍會限制為 4 10 億個項目的總計和 0X7FEFFFFF 中任何指定的維度 (0X7FFFFFC7 位元組陣列和陣列的單一位元組結構) 的最大索引。However, the array will still be limited to a total of 4 billion elements, and to a maximum index of 0X7FEFFFFF in any given dimension (0X7FFFFFC7 for byte arrays and arrays of single-byte structures). 一維陣列實作， ， ，和泛型介面。Single-dimensional arrays implement the , , , and generic interfaces. 陣列中提供實作在執行階段，以及泛型介面如此一來，未出現在宣告語法類別。The implementations are provided to arrays at run time, and as a result, the generic interfaces do not appear in the declaration syntax for the class. 此外，還有介面的成員可存取只能透過將轉型為泛型介面型別 （明確介面實作） 的陣列沒有參考主題。In addition, there are no reference topics for interface members that are accessible only by casting an array to the generic interface type (explicit interface implementations). 留意這些介面的其中一個陣列的轉換時的重點是成員的加入，請插入或移除項目 throw 。The key thing to be aware of when you cast an array to one of these interfaces is that members which add, insert, or remove elements throw . 物件會提供資訊的陣列型別宣告。 objects provide information about array type declarations. 具有相同的陣列型別的物件共用相同物件。 objects with the same array type share the same object. 和可能不會傳回預期的結果與因為如果陣列轉換成類型，結果是一個物件，而非陣列。 and might not return the expected results with because if an array is cast to the type , the result is an object, not an array. 也就是說，`typeof(System.Array).IsArray`傳回`false`，和`typeof(System.Array).GetElementType`傳回`null`。That is, `typeof(System.Array).IsArray` returns `false`, and `typeof(System.Array).GetElementType` returns `null`. 方法會複製項目相同的類型陣列之間的不只但不同類型的標準陣列之間; 它會處理類型會自動轉換。The method copies elements not only between arrays of the same type but also between standard arrays of different types; it handles type casting automatically. 某些方法，例如， ， ， ，和，提供多載，可接受參數，以容納陣列大容量為 64 位元整數。Some methods, such as , , , , and , provide overloads that accept 64-bit integers as parameters to accommodate large capacity arrays. 和傳回 64 位元整數，指出陣列的長度。 and return 64-bit integers indicating the length of the array. 不保證排序。The is not guaranteed to be sorted. 必須排序之前執行的作業 (例如) 需要的來排序。You must sort the prior to performing operations (such as ) that require the to be sorted. 使用的原生程式碼中的指標物件不支援，將會擲回數個方法。Using an object of pointers in native code is not supported and will throw a for several methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何項目型別整數的陣列型別的陣列之間複製。The following code example shows how copies elements between an array of type integer and an array of type . [!code-cpp[Classic Array Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Array Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Array Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化，並顯示其屬性和其項目。The following code example creates and initializes an and displays its properties and its elements. [!code-cpp[Classic Array Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array Example/CPP/source3.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Array Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array Example/CS/source3.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Array Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array Example/VB/source3.vb#2)]

threadsafe.span: 公用靜態 (在 Visual Basic 中) 這種類型的成員都具備執行緒安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此實作不會提供同步處理 （安全執行緒） 包裝函式; 不過，.NET Framework 類別根據提供自己的集合的同步化的版本屬性。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for an ; however, .NET Framework classes based on provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the property.

threadsafe.span: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<T> AsReadOnly<T> (T[] array);

summary.span: 傳回指定之陣列的唯讀包裝函式。

span.span: Returns a read-only wrapper for the specified array.

returns.span: 指定之陣列的唯讀 包裝函式。

span.span: A read-only wrapper for the specified array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免陣列的任何修改，公開的陣列，只能透過這個包裝函式。To prevent any modifications to the array, expose the array only through this wrapper. 是唯讀的集合是唯讀的集合只具有可防止修改集合的包裝函式因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列範例中的唯讀包裝陣列。The following example wraps an array in a read-only . [!code-cpp[System.Array.AsReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.AsReadOnly/CPP/arrayasreadonly.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Array.AsReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.AsReadOnly/CS/arrayasreadonly.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.AsReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.AsReadOnly/VB/arrayasreadonly.vb#1)]

returns.span: 如果找到 ，則為指定的 中指定的 索引；否則為負數。

span.span: The index of the specified in the specified , if is found; otherwise, a negative number.

returns.span: 如果找不到 且 小於 的一或多個項目，傳回的負數是大於 的第一個項目索引的位元補數。

span.span: If is not found and is less than one or more elements in , the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of the index of the first element that is larger than .

returns.span: 如果找不到 且 大於 的所有項目，傳回的負數是 (最後一個項目索引加 1) 的位元補數。

returns.span: 如果以未排序的 來呼叫這個方法，傳回值會不正確且可能傳回負數，即使 出現在 中也一樣。

span.span: If this method is called with a non-sorted , the return value can be incorrect and a negative number could be returned, even if is present in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不支援搜尋的陣列，其中包含負值的索引。This method does not support searching arrays that contain negative indexes. `array` 呼叫這個方法之前，必須先排序。`array` must be sorted before calling this method. 如果不包含指定的值，此方法會傳回負整數。If the does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 您可以將套用的位元補數 」 運算子 (~ 在 C# 中，`Not`在 Visual Basic 中) 設為負數的結果來產生索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operator (~ in C#, `Not` in Visual Basic) to the negative result to produce an index. 此索引大於陣列的上限是否有任何元素大於`value`陣列中。If this index is one greater than the upper bound of the array, there are no elements larger than `value` in the array. 否則，它是第一個元素大於索引`value`。Otherwise, it is the index of the first element that is larger than `value`. 可能是`value`或每個項目`array`必須實作介面，用於比較。Either `value` or every element of `array` must implement the interface, which is used for comparisons. 項目`array`已必須以遞增的值，根據所定義的排序次序排序實作; 否則結果可能不正確。The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. > [!NOTE] > 如果`value`未實作介面的項目`array`不需要測試的之前開始搜尋。If`value` does not implement the interface, the elements of `array` are not tested for before the search begins. 如果搜尋遇到未實作的項目，會擲回例外狀況。An exception is thrown if the search encounters an element that does not implement . 允許重複的項目。Duplicate elements are allowed. 如果包含多個元素等於`value`，方法會傳回的其中一個相符項目，並不一定是第一個索引。If the contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one. `null` 一定要與其他任何參考類型; 比較因此，比較`null`並不會產生例外狀況。`null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception. > [!NOTE] > 每個項目測試，`value`傳遞至適當實作，即使`value`是`null`。For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate implementation, even if `value` is `null`. 也就是說，實作可讓您決定如何為指定項目與比較`null`。That is, the implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`. 這個方法是 O (記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用找不到中的特定物件。The following code example shows how to use to locate a specific object in an . > [!NOTE] > 建立陣列的元素以遞增排序次序。The array is created with its elements in ascending sort order. 方法必須要以遞增順序排序的陣列。The method requires the array to be sorted in ascending order. [!code-cpp[Classic Array.BinarySearch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.BinarySearch Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Array.BinarySearch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.BinarySearch Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Array.BinarySearch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.BinarySearch Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不支援搜尋的陣列，其中包含負值的索引。This method does not support searching arrays that contain negative indexes. `array` 呼叫這個方法之前，必須先排序。`array` must be sorted before calling this method. 如果不包含指定的值，此方法會傳回負整數。If the does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 您可以將套用的位元補數 」 運算子 (~ 在 C# 中，`Not`在 Visual Basic 中) 設為負數的結果來產生索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operator (~ in C#, `Not` in Visual Basic) to the negative result to produce an index. 此索引大於陣列的上限是否有任何元素大於`value`陣列中。If this index is one greater than the upper bound of the array, there are no elements larger than `value` in the array. 否則，它是第一個元素大於索引`value`。Otherwise, it is the index of the first element that is larger than `value`. 比較子自訂元素的比較方式。The comparer customizes how the elements are compared. 例如，您可以使用為要執行不區分大小寫的字串搜尋的比較子。For example, you can use a as the comparer to perform case-insensitive string searches. 如果`comparer`不`null`的項目`array`指定使用指定的值比較實作。If `comparer` is not `null`, the elements of `array` are compared to the specified value using the specified implementation. 項目`array`已必須以遞增的值，根據所定義的排序次序排序`comparer`; 否則結果可能不正確。The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by `comparer`; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. 如果`comparer`是`null`，進行比較使用實作所提供項目本身，或指定的值。If`comparer` is `null`, the comparison is done using the implementation provided by the element itself or by the specified value. 項目`array`已必須以遞增的值，根據所定義的排序次序排序實作; 否則結果可能不正確。The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. > [!NOTE] > 如果`comparer`是`null`和`value`未實作介面的項目`array`不需要測試的之前開始搜尋。If `comparer` is `null` and `value` does not implement the interface, the elements of `array` are not tested for before the search begins. 如果搜尋遇到未實作的項目，會擲回例外狀況。An exception is thrown if the search encounters an element that does not implement . 允許重複的項目。Duplicate elements are allowed. 如果包含多個元素等於`value`，方法會傳回的其中一個相符項目，並不一定是第一個索引。If the contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one. `null` 一定要與其他任何參考類型; 比較因此，比較`null`並不會產生例外狀況。`null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception. > [!NOTE] > 每個項目測試，`value`傳遞至適當實作，即使`value`是`null`。For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate implementation, even if `value` is `null`. 也就是說，實作可讓您決定如何為指定項目與比較`null`。That is, the implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`. 這個方法是 O (記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不支援搜尋的陣列，其中包含負值的索引。This method does not support searching arrays that contain negative indexes. `array` 呼叫這個方法之前，必須先排序。`array` must be sorted before calling this method. 如果不包含指定的值，此方法會傳回負整數。If the does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 您可以將套用的位元補數 」 運算子 (~ 在 C# 中，`Not`在 Visual Basic 中) 設為負數的結果來產生索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operator (~ in C#, `Not` in Visual Basic) to the negative result to produce an index. 此索引大於陣列的上限是否有任何元素大於`value`陣列中。If this index is one greater than the upper bound of the array, there are no elements larger than `value` in the array. 否則，它是第一個元素大於索引`value`。Otherwise, it is the index of the first element that is larger than `value`. 可能是`value`或每個項目`array`必須實作介面，用於比較。Either `value` or every element of `array` must implement the interface, which is used for comparisons. 項目`array`已必須以遞增的值，根據所定義的排序次序排序實作; 否則結果可能不正確。The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. > [!NOTE] > 如果`value`未實作介面的項目`array`不需要測試的之前開始搜尋。If `value` does not implement the interface, the elements of `array` are not tested for before the search begins. 如果搜尋遇到未實作的項目，會擲回例外狀況。An exception is thrown if the search encounters an element that does not implement . 允許重複的項目。Duplicate elements are allowed. 如果包含多個元素等於`value`，方法會傳回的其中一個相符項目，並不一定是第一個索引。If the contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one. `null` 一定要與其他任何參考類型; 比較因此，比較`null`並不會產生例外狀況。`null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception. > [!NOTE] > 每個項目測試，`value`傳遞至適當實作，即使`value`是`null`。For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate implementation, even if `value` is `null`. 也就是說，實作可讓您決定如何為指定項目與比較`null`。That is, the implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`. 這個方法是 O (記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.

Examples 下列程式碼範例示範泛型方法的多載而泛型方法的多載。The following code example demonstrates the generic method overload and the generic method overload. 建立字串陣列，不依特定順序。An array of strings is created, in no particular order. 陣列會顯示、 已排序，並且會再次顯示。The array is displayed, sorted, and displayed again. 必須排序陣列，才能使用方法。Arrays must be sorted in order to use the method. > [!NOTE] > 若要呼叫和泛型方法看起來不任何不同於呼叫其非泛型對應項目，因為 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 推斷的第一個引數類型的泛型型別參數的型別。The calls to the and generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first argument. 如果您使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要檢查的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)，您可以查看呼叫泛型方法。If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called. 泛型方法的多載然後來搜尋兩個字串，而非在陣列與其中一個，為。The generic method overload is then used to search for two strings, one that is not in the array and one that is. 陣列和傳回值方法會傳遞至`ShowWhere`泛型的方法，如果找到字串，否則項目搜尋字串會介於陣列中時顯示的索引值。The array and the return value of the method are passed to the `ShowWhere` generic method, which displays the index value if the string is found, and otherwise the elements the search string would fall between if it were in the array. 索引是負值，如果字串不是陣列，所以`ShowWhere`方法會採用的位元補數 (~ 運算子，在 C# 和 Visual c + +，`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的為-1) 取得第一個元素大於搜尋清單中的索引 str正執行。The index is negative if the string is not in the array, so the `ShowWhere` method takes the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor`-1 in Visual Basic) to obtain the index of the first element in the list that is larger than the search string. `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 比較子的呼叫方法，使字串排序高-到-低而不是低到高反轉比較元的順序。The comparer calls the method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high. 陣列會顯示、 已排序，並且會再次顯示。The array is displayed, sorted, and displayed again. 必須排序陣列，才能使用方法。Arrays must be sorted in order to use the method. > [!NOTE] > 若要呼叫和泛型方法看起來不任何不同於呼叫其非泛型對應項目，因為 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 推斷的第一個引數類型的泛型型別參數的型別。The calls to the and generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first argument. 如果您使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要檢查的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)，您可以查看呼叫泛型方法。If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called. 泛型方法的多載然後來搜尋兩個字串，而非在陣列與其中一個，為。The generic method overload is then used to search for two strings, one that is not in the array and one that is. 陣列和傳回值方法會傳遞至`ShowWhere`泛型的方法，如果找到字串，否則項目搜尋字串會介於陣列中時顯示的索引值。The array and the return value of the method are passed to the `ShowWhere` generic method, which displays the index value if the string is found, and otherwise the elements the search string would fall between if it were in the array. 索引是負值，如果字串不是 n 陣列，所以`ShowWhere`方法會採用的位元補數 (~ 運算子，在 C# 和 Visual c + +，`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的為-1) 取得第一個元素大於搜尋 stri 清單中的索引ng。The index is negative if the string is not n the array, so the `ShowWhere` method takes the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) to obtain the index of the first element in the list that is larger than the search string. [!code-cpp[Array_SortSearchComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortSearchComparer/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_SortSearchComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortSearchComparer/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_SortSearchComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortSearchComparer/vb/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The type of the elements of the array.

param.name: array
param.span: 要搜尋的已排序且為一維之以零為起始的 。

param.name: length

param.name: value
param.span: 要搜尋的物件。

span.span: The object to search for.

summary.span: 使用 的每個項目和指定值所實作的 泛型介面，在一維已排序的陣列內某個範圍的項目中搜尋值。

span.span: Searches a range of elements in a one-dimensional sorted array for a value, using the generic interface implemented by each element of the and by the specified value.

returns.span: 如果找到 ，則為指定的 中指定的 索引；否則為負數。

span.span: The index of the specified in the specified , if is found; otherwise, a negative number.

returns.span: 如果找不到 且 小於 的一或多個項目，傳回的負數是大於 的第一個項目索引的位元補數。

span.span: If is not found and is less than one or more elements in , the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of the index of the first element that is larger than .

returns.span: 如果找不到 且 大於 的所有項目，傳回的負數是 (最後一個項目索引加 1) 的位元補數。

span.span: If is not found and is greater than all elements in , the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of (the index of the last element plus 1).

returns.span: 如果以未排序的 來呼叫這個方法，傳回值會不正確且可能傳回負數，即使 出現在 中也一樣。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不支援搜尋的陣列，其中包含負值的索引。This method does not support searching arrays that contain negative indexes. `array` 呼叫這個方法之前，必須先排序。`array` must be sorted before calling this method. 如果陣列未包含指定的值，則方法會傳回負整數。If the array does not contain the specified value, the method returns a negative integer. 您可以將套用的位元補數 」 運算子 (~ 在 C# 中，`Not`在 Visual Basic 中) 設為負數的結果來產生索引。You can apply the bitwise complement operator (~ in C#, `Not` in Visual Basic) to the negative result to produce an index. 這個索引等於陣列的大小，如果有任何項目大於`value`陣列中。If this index is equal to the size of the array, there are no elements larger than `value` in the array. 否則，它是第一個元素大於索引`value`。Otherwise, it is the index of the first element that is larger than `value`. `T` 必須實作泛型介面，用於比較。`T` must implement the generic interface, which is used for comparisons. 項目`array`已必須以遞增的值，根據所定義的排序次序排序實作; 否則結果可能不正確。The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. 允許重複的項目。Duplicate elements are allowed. 如果包含多個元素等於`value`，方法會傳回的其中一個相符項目，並不一定是第一個索引。If the contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one. `null` 一定要與其他任何參考類型; 比較因此，比較`null`並不會產生例外狀況。`null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception. > [!NOTE] > 每個項目測試，`value`傳遞至適當實作，即使`value`是`null`。For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate implementation, even if `value` is `null`. 也就是說，實作可讓您決定如何為指定項目與比較`null`。That is, the implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`. 這個方法是 O (記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.

否則結果可能不正確。The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by `comparer`; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. 如果`comparer`是`null`，進行比較使用類型提供的泛型介面實作`T`。If `comparer` is `null`, the comparison is done using the generic interface implementation provided for type `T`. 項目`array`已必須以遞增的值，根據所定義的排序次序排序實作; 否則結果可能不正確。The elements of `array` must already be sorted in increasing value according to the sort order defined by the implementation; otherwise, the result might be incorrect. 允許重複的項目。Duplicate elements are allowed. 如果包含多個元素等於`value`，方法會傳回的其中一個相符項目，並不一定是第一個索引。If the contains more than one element equal to `value`, the method returns the index of only one of the occurrences, and not necessarily the first one. `null` 一定要與其他任何參考類型; 比較因此，比較`null`不會產生例外狀況時使用。`null` can always be compared with any other reference type; therefore, comparisons with `null` do not generate an exception when using . > [!NOTE] > 每個項目測試，`value`傳遞至適當實作，即使`value`是`null`。For every element tested, `value` is passed to the appropriate implementation, even if `value` is `null`. 也就是說，實作可讓您決定如何為指定項目與比較`null`。That is, the implementation determines how a given element compares to `null`. 這個方法是 O (記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。This method is an O(log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法重設項目類型的預設值為陣列中的每個項目。This method resets each element in an array to the element type's default value. 它會設定參考類型的項目 (包括項目) 來`null`，並將實值類型的項目設定為下表中所顯示的預設值。It sets elements of reference types (including elements) to `null`, and sets elements of value types to the default values shown in the following table. |類型Type|值Value| |----------|-----------| ||`false`| |所有整數和浮點數值類型All integral and floating point numeric types|0 （零）0 (zero)| ||| |其他實值類型Other value types|預設值是類型的欄位Default value of the type's fields| 範圍清除項目自動換行逐列多維陣列中。The range of cleared elements wrap from row to row in a multi-dimensional array. 這個方法只會清除的項目; 的值它不會刪除項目本身。This method only clears the values of the elements; it does not delete the elements themselves. 陣列有固定的大小。因此，無法加入或移除項目。An array has a fixed size; therefore, elements cannot be added or removed. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來重設一維、 二維和三維陣列中的整數值。The following example uses the method to reset integer values in a one-dimensional, two-dimensional, and three-dimensional array. [!code-csharp[System.Array.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Clear/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Clear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Clear/vb/example.vb#1)] 下列範例會定義`TimeZoneTime`結構，其中包含欄位和欄位。The following example defines a `TimeZoneTime` structure that includes a field and a field. 然後它會呼叫方法，以清除一個項目中的兩個元素陣列`TimeZoneTime`值。It then calls the method to clear one element in a two-element array of `TimeZoneTime` values. 方法會將已清除項目的值設定的預設值物件，它是`null`的預設值和物件，它是。The method sets the value of the cleared element to the default value of a object, which is `null`, and the default value of a object, which is . [!code-csharp[System.Array.Clear#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Clear/cs/clearstruct1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Clear#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Clear/vb/clearstruct1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 建立 的淺層複本。

span.span: Creates a shallow copy of the .

returns.span: 的淺層複本。

span.span: A shallow copy of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 淺層複本的元素複製，不論它們是參考類型或實值類型，但是不會複製參考所參考的物件。A shallow copy of an copies only the elements of the , whether they are reference types or value types, but it does not copy the objects that the references refer to. 在新的參考指向相同物件中原始的參考指向。The references in the new point to the same objects that the references in the original point to. 相反地，深層複製的複製項目，並直接或間接參考之元素的所有項目。In contrast, a deep copy of an copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 複製是相同與原始。The clone is of the same as the original . 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例複製品陣列，並示範的淺層複本的行為。The following code example clones a array and demonstrates the behavior of a shallow copy. [!code-cpp[System.Array.Clone#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Clone/CPP/arrayclone.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Array.Clone#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Clone/CS/arrayclone.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Clone#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Clone/VB/arrayclone.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ConstrainedCopy (Array sourceArray, int sourceIndex, Array destinationArray, int destinationIndex, int length);
.method public static hidebysig void ConstrainedCopy(class System.Array sourceArray, int32 sourceIndex, class System.Array destinationArray, int32 destinationIndex, int32 length) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ConstrainedCopy (sourceArray As Array, sourceIndex As Integer, destinationArray As Array, destinationIndex As Integer, length As Integer)
public: static void ConstrainedCopy(Array ^ sourceArray, int sourceIndex, Array ^ destinationArray, int destinationIndex, int length);

param.name: sourceArray
param.span: 包含要複製資料的 。

span.span: The that contains the data to copy.

param.name: sourceIndex
param.span: 32 位元的整數，代表 sourceArray 中的索引，由此開始複製。

param.name: destinationArray
param.span: 接收資料的 。

span.span: The that receives the data.

param.name: destinationIndex
param.span: 32 位元的整數，代表 destinationArray 中的索引，由此開始複製。

param.name: length
param.span: 32 位元整數，表示要複製的項目數目。

summary.span: 從 複製某範圍的項目 (從指定的來源索引開始)，並且將它們貼至另一個 (從指定的目的索引開始)。

span.span: Copies a range of elements from an starting at the specified source index and pastes them to another starting at the specified destination index.

summary.span: 如果此複本未完全成功，則保證所有的變更一定未完成。

span.span: Guarantees that all changes are undone if the copy does not succeed completely.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `sourceArray`和`destinationArray`參數必須有相同的維度數目。The `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` parameters must have the same number of dimensions. `sourceArray`類型必須相同，或衍生自`destinationArray`輸入; 否則就會擲回。The `sourceArray` type must be the same as or derived from the `destinationArray` type; otherwise, an is thrown. 不同於，執行任何作業之前先確認陣列類型的相容性。Unlike , verifies the compatibility of the array types before performing any operation. 多維陣列之間進行複製，當陣列的行為如同長的一維陣列，其中資料列 （或資料行） 會在概念上排列端對端。When copying between multidimensional arrays, the array behaves like a long one-dimensional array, where the rows (or columns) are conceptually laid end-to-end. 例如，如果陣列有三個資料列 （或資料行） 使用四個元素陣列的開頭，複製六個項目會複製全部的四個元素的第一個資料列 （或資料行） 和第二個資料列 （或資料行） 的前兩個項目。For example, if an array has three rows (or columns) with four elements each, copying six elements from the beginning of the array would copy all four elements of the first row (or column) and the first two elements of the second row (or column). 若要開始複製的第三個資料列 （或資料行），第二個項目從`sourceIndex`必須第一個資料列 （或資料行） 的上限加上第二個資料列 （或資料行） 的長度再加上兩個。To start copying from the second element of the third row (or column), `sourceIndex` must be the upper bound of the first row (or column) plus the length of the second row (or column) plus two. 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`重疊，這個方法的行為如同的原始值`sourceArray`已保留在暫存位置之前`destinationArray`會覆寫。If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` overlap, this method behaves as if the original values of `sourceArray` were preserved in a temporary location before `destinationArray` is overwritten. [C++][C++] 這個方法相當於標準的 C/c + + 函式`memmove`，而非`memcpy`。This method is equivalent to the standard C/C++ function `memmove`, not `memcpy`. 陣列可以是參考類型的陣列或實值型別陣列。The arrays can be reference-type arrays or value-type arrays. 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`有兩個參考類型的陣列或類型的兩個陣列，會執行的淺層複本。If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` are both reference-type arrays or are both arrays of type , a shallow copy is performed. 淺層複本新包含相同項目與原始參考。A shallow copy of an is a new containing references to the same elements as the original . 項目不會複製本身或項目所參考的任何項目。The elements themselves or anything referenced by the elements are not copied. 相反地，深層複製的複製項目，並直接或間接參考之元素的所有項目。In contrast, a deep copy of an copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 如果此方法會擲回的例外狀況，正在複製`destinationArray`仍維持不變; 因此，可用於限制的執行區域 ()。If this method throws an exception while copying, the `destinationArray` remains unchanged; therefore, can be used within a constrained execution region (). 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.

MemberSignature.Value: public static TOutput[] ConvertAll<TInput,TOutput> (TInput[] array, Converter<TInput,TOutput> converter);
.method public static hidebysig !!TOutput[] ConvertAll<TInput, TOutput>(!!TInput[] array, class System.Converter`2<!!TInput, !!TOutput> converter) cil managed
Public Shared Function ConvertAll(Of TInput, TOutput) (array As TInput(), converter As Converter(Of TInput, TOutput)) As TOutput()

span.span: The type of the elements of the source array.
The type of the elements of the target array.

param.name: array
param.span: 要轉換成目標類型之以零為起始的一維 。

span.span: The one-dimensional, zero-based to convert to a target type.

param.name: converter
param.span: ，可將某一個類型的每一個項目轉換成另一個類型。

span.span: A that converts each element from one type to another type.

summary.span: 將某一個類型的陣列轉換成另一個類型的陣列。

span.span: Converts an array of one type to an array of another type.

returns.span: 目標類型的陣列，其中包含來源陣列中已轉換的項目。

span.span: An array of the target type containing the converted elements from the source array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是將物件轉換成目標型別方法委派。The is a delegate to a method that converts an object to the target type. 項目`array`分別傳遞至，和已轉換的項目會儲存在新的陣列。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the , and the converted elements are saved in the new array. 來源`array`維持不變。The source `array` remains unchanged. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義方法，名為`PointFToPoint`將轉換結構以結構。The following code example defines a method named `PointFToPoint` that converts a structure to a structure. 這個範例會建立的陣列結構、 建立`Converter`委派 (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)`在 Visual Basic 中) 來代表`PointFToPoint`方法，並傳遞至委派方法。The example then creates an array of structures, creates a `Converter` delegate (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` in Visual Basic) to represent the `PointFToPoint` method, and passes the delegate to the method. 方法會將傳遞的輸入清單的每個項目`PointFToPoint`方法並將已轉換的項目放入新的清單結構。The method passes each element of the input list to the `PointFToPoint` method and puts the converted elements into a new list of structures. 這兩份清單會顯示。Both lists are displayed. [!code-cpp[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Copy (Array sourceArray, Array destinationArray, int length);
.method public static hidebysig void Copy(class System.Array sourceArray, class System.Array destinationArray, int32 length) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Copy (sourceArray As Array, destinationArray As Array, length As Integer)
public: static void Copy(Array ^ sourceArray, Array ^ destinationArray, int length);

param.name: sourceArray
param.span: 包含要複製資料的 。

span.span: The that contains the data to copy.

param.name: destinationArray
param.span: 接收資料的 。

span.span: The that receives the data.

param.name: length
param.span: 32 位元整數，表示要複製的項目數目。

span.span: A 32-bit integer that represents the number of elements to copy.

summary.span: 從 複製某範圍的項目 (從第一個項目開始)，並且將它們貼至另一個 (從第一個項目開始)。

span.span: Copies a range of elements from an starting at the first element and pastes them into another starting at the first element.

summary.span: 長度已指定為 32 位元整數。

span.span: The length is specified as a 32-bit integer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `sourceArray`和`destinationArray`參數必須有相同的維度數目。The `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` parameters must have the same number of dimensions. 此外，`destinationArray`必須已有已建立維度，必須有足夠數目的項目，以容納所複製的資料。In addition, `destinationArray` must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements to accommodate the copied data. 多維陣列之間進行複製，當陣列的行為如同長的一維陣列，其中資料列 （或資料行） 會在概念上排列端對端。When copying between multidimensional arrays, the array behaves like a long one-dimensional array, where the rows (or columns) are conceptually laid end to end. 例如，如果陣列有三個資料列 （或資料行） 使用四個元素陣列的開頭，複製六個項目會複製全部的四個元素的第一個資料列 （或資料行） 和第二個資料列 （或資料行） 的前兩個項目。For example, if an array has three rows (or columns) with four elements each, copying six elements from the beginning of the array would copy all four elements of the first row (or column) and the first two elements of the second row (or column). 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`重疊，這個方法的行為如同的原始值`sourceArray`已保留在暫存位置之前`destinationArray`會覆寫。If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` overlap, this method behaves as if the original values of `sourceArray` were preserved in a temporary location before `destinationArray` is overwritten. [C++][C++] 這個方法相當於標準的 C/c + + 函式`memmove`，而非`memcpy`。This method is equivalent to the standard C/C++ function `memmove`, not `memcpy`. 陣列可以是參考類型的陣列或實值型別陣列。The arrays can be reference-type arrays or value-type arrays. 執行類型向下轉型時，視需要而定。Type downcasting is performed, as required. - 當複製到實值類型陣列的參考型別陣列，每個項目會進行 unboxed 處理，然後再複製。When copying from a reference-type array to a value-type array, each element is unboxed and then copied. 當實值型別陣列中複製到參考型別陣列，每個項目會進行 boxed 處理，然後再複製。When copying from a value-type array to a reference-type array, each element is boxed and then copied. - 從參考類型或實值類型陣列到陣列、建立來保存每個值或參考，然後再複製。When copying from a reference-type or value-type array to an array, an is created to hold each value or reference and then copied. 從複製時陣列是參考類型或實值型別陣列和指派，則不可能就會擲回。When copying from an array to a reference-type or value-type array and the assignment is not possible, an is thrown. - 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`有兩個參考類型的陣列或類型的兩個陣列，會執行的淺層複本。If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` are both reference-type arrays or are both arrays of type , a shallow copy is performed. 淺層複本新包含相同項目與原始參考。A shallow copy of an is a new containing references to the same elements as the original . 項目不會複製本身或項目所參考的任何項目。The elements themselves or anything referenced by the elements are not copied. 相反地，深層複製的複製項目，並直接或間接參考之元素的所有項目。In contrast, a deep copy of an copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 如果陣列不相容的型別會擲回。An is thrown if the arrays are of incompatible types. 型別相容性的定義方式如下：Type compatibility is defined as follows: - 類型為與其本身相容。A type is compatible with itself. - 實值類型會與相容和該實值型別所實作的介面型別。A value type is compatible with and with an interface type implemented by that value type. 連接至介面，它會直接實作該介面時，才視為實值類型。A value type is considered connected to an interface only if it implements that interface directly. 已中斷連線的類型不相容。Disconnected types are not compatible. - 兩個內建函式 （預先定義） 的實值型別都相容，是否從來源類型複製到目的地類型進行擴展轉換。Two intrinsic (predefined) value types are compatible if copying from the source type to the destination type is a widening conversion. 擴展轉換不會遺失資訊，而縮小轉換可能會遺失資訊。A widening conversion never loses information, whereas a narrowing conversion can lose information. 例如，將 32 位元帶正負號的整數轉換為 64 位元帶正負號的整數擴展轉換，並將 64 位元帶正負號的整數轉換為 32 位元帶正負號的整數是縮小轉換。For example, converting a 32-bit signed integer to a 64-bit signed integer is a widening conversion, and converting a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer is a narrowing conversion. 如需有關轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about conversions, see . - 在非內建 （使用者定義） 的實值類型是只與其本身相容。A nonintrinsic (user-defined) value type is compatible only with itself. - 列舉值有隱含轉換成以及其基礎類型。Enumerations have an implicit conversion to and to their underlying type. 如果在每個項目`sourceArray`需要向下轉型 （比方說，從基底類別衍生的類別或介面的物件） 以及一或多個項目無法轉換成對應的型別中`destinationArray`、就會擲回。If every element in `sourceArray` requires a downcast (for example, from a base class to a derived class or from an interface to an object) and one or more elements cannot be cast to the corresponding type in `destinationArray`, an is thrown. 如果此方法會擲回的例外狀況，同時將複製的狀態`destinationArray`是未定義。If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `destinationArray` is undefined. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`.

param.span: 32 位元整數，表示要複製的項目數目。

span.span: A 32-bit integer that represents the number of elements to copy.

summary.span: 從 複製某範圍的項目 (從指定的來源索引開始)，並且將它們貼至另一個 (從指定的目的索引開始)。

span.span: Copies a range of elements from an starting at the specified source index and pastes them to another starting at the specified destination index.

summary.span: 長度與索引都指定為 32 位元的整數。

span.span: The length and the indexes are specified as 32-bit integers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `sourceArray`和`destinationArray`參數必須有相同的維度數目。The `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` parameters must have the same number of dimensions. 此外，`destinationArray`必須已有已建立維度，必須有足夠數目的項目從開始`destinationIndex`以容納所複製的資料的位置。In addition, `destinationArray` must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements starting from the `destinationIndex` position to accommodate the copied data. 多維陣列之間進行複製，當陣列的行為如同長的一維陣列，其中資料列 （或資料行） 會在概念上排列端對端。When copying between multidimensional arrays, the array behaves like a long one-dimensional array, where the rows (or columns) are conceptually laid end-to-end. 例如，如果陣列有三個資料列 （或資料行） 使用四個元素陣列的開頭，複製六個項目會複製全部的四個元素的第一個資料列 （或資料行） 和第二個資料列 （或資料行） 的前兩個項目。For example, if an array has three rows (or columns) with four elements each, copying six elements from the beginning of the array would copy all four elements of the first row (or column) and the first two elements of the second row (or column). 若要開始複製的第三個資料列 （或資料行），第二個項目從`sourceIndex`必須第一個資料列 （或資料行） 的上限加上第二個資料列 （或資料行） 的長度再加上兩個。To start copying from the second element of the third row (or column), `sourceIndex` must be the upper bound of the first row (or column) plus the length of the second row (or column) plus two. 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`重疊，這個方法的行為如同的原始值`sourceArray`已保留在暫存位置之前`destinationArray`會覆寫。If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` overlap, this method behaves as if the original values of `sourceArray` were preserved in a temporary location before `destinationArray` is overwritten. [C++][C++] 這個方法相當於標準的 C/c + + 函式`memmove`，而非`memcpy`。This method is equivalent to the standard C/C++ function `memmove`, not `memcpy`. 陣列可以是參考類型的陣列或實值型別陣列。The arrays can be reference-type arrays or value-type arrays. 執行類型向下轉型時，視需要而定。Type downcasting is performed, as required. - 當複製到實值類型陣列的參考型別陣列，每個項目會進行 unboxed 處理，然後再複製。When copying from a reference-type array to a value-type array, each element is unboxed and then copied. 當實值型別陣列中複製到參考型別陣列，每個項目會進行 boxed 處理，然後再複製。When copying from a value-type array to a reference-type array, each element is boxed and then copied. - 從參考類型或實值類型陣列到陣列、建立來保存每個值或參考，然後再複製。When copying from a reference-type or value-type array to an array, an is created to hold each value or reference and then copied. 從複製時陣列是參考類型或實值型別陣列和指派，則不可能就會擲回。When copying from an array to a reference-type or value-type array and the assignment is not possible, an is thrown. - 如果`sourceArray`和`destinationArray`有兩個參考類型的陣列或類型的兩個陣列，會執行的淺層複本。If `sourceArray` and `destinationArray` are both reference-type arrays or are both arrays of type , a shallow copy is performed. 淺層複本新包含相同項目與原始參考。A shallow copy of an is a new containing references to the same elements as the original . 項目不會複製本身或項目所參考的任何項目。The elements themselves or anything referenced by the elements are not copied. 相反地，深層複製的複製項目，並直接或間接參考之元素的所有項目。In contrast, a deep copy of an copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 如果陣列不相容的型別會擲回。An is thrown if the arrays are of incompatible types. 型別相容性的定義方式如下：Type compatibility is defined as follows: - 類型為與其本身相容。A type is compatible with itself. - 實值類型會與相容和該實值型別所實作的介面型別。A value type is compatible with and with an interface type implemented by that value type. 連接至介面，它會直接實作該介面時，才視為實值類型。A value type is considered connected to an interface only if it implements that interface directly. 已中斷連線的類型不相容。Disconnected types are not compatible. - 兩個內建函式 （預先定義） 的實值型別都相容，是否從來源類型複製到目的地類型進行擴展轉換。Two intrinsic (predefined) value types are compatible if copying from the source type to the destination type is a widening conversion. 擴展轉換不會遺失資訊，而縮小轉換可能會遺失資訊。A widening conversion never loses information, whereas a narrowing conversion can lose information. 例如，將 32 位元帶正負號的整數轉換為 64 位元帶正負號的整數擴展轉換，並將 64 位元帶正負號的整數轉換為 32 位元帶正負號的整數是縮小轉換。For example, converting a 32-bit signed integer to a 64-bit signed integer is a widening conversion, and converting a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer is a narrowing conversion. 如需有關轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about conversions, see . - 在非內建 （使用者定義） 的實值類型是只與其本身相容。A nonintrinsic (user-defined) value type is compatible only with itself. - 列舉值有隱含轉換成以及其基礎類型。Enumerations have an implicit conversion to and to their underlying type. 如果在每個項目`sourceArray`需要向下轉型 （比方說，從基底類別衍生的類別或介面的物件） 以及一或多個項目無法轉換成對應的型別中`destinationArray`、就會擲回。If every element in `sourceArray` requires a downcast (for example, from a base class to a derived class or from an interface to an object) and one or more elements cannot be cast to the corresponding type in `destinationArray`, an is thrown. 如果此方法會擲回的例外狀況，同時將複製的狀態`destinationArray`是未定義。If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `destinationArray` is undefined. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從一個複製型別的到另一個類型為整數。The following code example shows how to copy from one of type to another of type integer. [!code-cpp[Classic Array.Copy1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.Copy1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Array.Copy1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.Copy1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Array.Copy1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.Copy1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將目前一維陣列的所有項目複製到指定的一維陣列 (從指定的目的陣列索引開始)。

span.span: Copies all the elements of the current one-dimensional array to the specified one-dimensional array starting at the specified destination array index.

summary.span: 索引已指定為 32 位元整數。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會複製到目前的陣列執行個體的所有項目`array`索引處開始的目的陣列`index`。This method copies all the elements of the current array instance to the `array` destination array, starting at index `index`. `array`目的陣列必須已經有尚未建立維度，而且必須具有足夠容納複製之元素的項目數目。The `array` destination array must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements to accommodate the copied elements. 否則，方法會擲回例外狀況。Otherwise, the method throws an exception. 這個方法支援介面。This method supports the interface. 如果實作是不明確的需求，使用以避免額外的間接取值。If implementing is not explicitly required, use to avoid an extra indirection. 如果此方法會擲回的例外狀況，同時將複製的狀態`array`是未定義。If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `array` is undefined. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。它會執行淺層複本。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .It performs a shallow copy only. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將複製到另一個。The following code example shows how to copy an to another . [!code-cpp[Classic Array.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.CopyTo Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Array.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.CopyTo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Array.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.CopyTo Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何將複製到另一個，則為非零的下限。The following code example shows how to copy an to another with a nonzero lower bound. 請注意，整個來源複製時，包括覆寫現有的項目在目標中的空項目。Note that the entire source is copied, including empty elements that overwrite existing elements in the target . [!code-cpp[Classic Array.CopyTo Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.CopyTo Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Array.CopyTo Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.CopyTo Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Array.CopyTo Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.CopyTo Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會複製到目前的陣列執行個體的所有項目`array`索引處開始的目的陣列`index`。This method copies all the elements of the current array instance to the `array` destination array, starting at index `index`. `array`目的陣列必須已經有尚未建立維度，而且必須具有足夠容納複製之元素的項目數目。The `array` destination array must already have been dimensioned and must have a sufficient number of elements to accommodate the copied elements. 否則，方法會擲回例外狀況。Otherwise, the method throws an exception. 這個方法支援介面。This method supports the interface. 如果實作是不明確的需求，使用以避免額外的間接取值。If implementing is not explicitly required, use to avoid an extra indirection. 如果此方法會擲回的例外狀況，同時將複製的狀態`array`是未定義。If this method throws an exception while copying, the state of `array` is undefined. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。它會執行淺層複本。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .It performs a shallow copy only. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將複製到另一個。The following code example shows how to copy an to another . remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 項目`array`分別傳遞至，並在找到相符項目時，會停止處理。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the , and processing is stopped when a match is found. > [!NOTE] > 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，就不需要建立明確委派。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the delegate explicitly. 這些語言推斷正確的委派，從內容，並自動建立。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下列範例會指定比對條件方法 usinglambda 運算式，以檢查是否憑藉開頭為指定的字母或世界各地是否位於指定的陣列。The following example specifies the match conditions for the method usinglambda expressions to check whether a planet starts with a given letter or whether the planet is found on the given array. [!code-csharp[System.Array.Exists#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.exists/cs/exists3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Exists#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.exists/vb/exists3.vb#3)] 下列範例會使用方法，指出是否將字串陣列中的任何名稱開頭為指定的字元。The following example uses the method to indicate whether any names in a string array begin with a specified character. 此範例會具現化`StringSearcher`物件，並傳遞要搜尋其類別建構函式的字串。The example instantiates a `StringSearcher` object by passing the string to search for to its class constructor. `StringSearcher.StartsWith`方法具有相同的簽章委派。The `StringSearcher.StartsWith` method has same signature as the delegate. 當方法呼叫，直到傳回陣列的每個成員會傳遞給委派`true`或會逐一查看陣列中的所有項目。When the method is called, each member of the array is passed to the delegate until it returns `true` or iterates all the elements in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Array.Exists#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.exists/cs/exists1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Exists#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.exists/vb/exists1.vb#1)] 您可以也使用 lambda 運算式而非明確定義其簽章對應的方法委派。You can also use a lambda expression rather than explicitly define a method whose signature corresponds to that of the delegate. 下列範例會取代`StringSearcher`類別和其`StartsWith`方法與 lambda 運算式。The following example replaces the `StringSearcher` class and its `StartsWith` method with a lambda expression. [!code-csharp[System.Array.Exists#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.exists/cs/exists2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Exists#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.exists/vb/exists2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一種委派的方法或 lambda 運算式以傳回`true`傳送至的物件是否符合委派或 lambda 運算式中定義的條件。The is a delegate to a method or a lambda expression that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate or lambda expression. 項目`array`分別傳遞至、 第一個元素開始和結尾最後一個項目。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the , starting with the first element and ending with the last element. 找到相符項目時，會停止處理。Processing is stopped when a match is found. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下列範例會使用委派與泛型的方法來搜尋的陣列結構。The following example uses a delegate with the generic method to search an array of structures. 委派所表示的方法`ProductGT10`，傳回`true`產品 X 和 Y 欄位是否大於 100000。The method the delegate represents, `ProductGT10`, returns `true` if the product of the X and Y fields is greater than 100,000. 方法會呼叫委派的陣列，傳回符合測試條件的第一個點的每個項目。The method calls the delegate for each element of the array, returning the first point that meets the test condition. > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 和 C# 使用者不必明確地建立委派，或指定之泛型方法的型別引數。Visual Basic and C# users do not have to create the delegate explicitly or specify the type argument of the generic method. 在編譯器判斷您提供的方法引數的必要型別。The compilers determine the necessary types from the method arguments you supply. [!code-csharp[System.Array.Find#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.find/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Find#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.find/vb/source.vb#1)] 而不是具有所需的簽章的方法中明確定義具現化委派，並傳遞至委派方法，您就可使用 lambda 運算式。Rather than explicitly defining a method with the necessary signature, instantiating a delegate, and passing the delegate to the method, it is customary to use a lambda expression. 下列範例等同於前一個，不同之處在於它會使用 lambda 運算式，當做`match`引數。The following example is identical to the previous one, except that it uses a lambda expression as the `match` argument. [!code-csharp[System.Array.Find#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.find/cs/lambda.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Find#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.find/vb/lambda.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 項目`array`分別傳遞至，和符合之條件的項目會儲存在傳回的陣列。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the , and the elements that match the conditions are saved in the returned array. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立 50 的隨機數字的陣列，範圍從 0 到 1000 的值。The following example creates an array of 50 random numbers with values that can range from 0 to 1,000. 然後它會呼叫方法與 lambda 運算式的傳回值範圍從 300 為 600。It then calls the method with a lambda expression that returns the values that range from 300 to 600. 請注意，lambda 運算式傳遞參數，名為`x`; 這代表傳遞至個別的陣列成員。Note that the lambda expression is passed a parameter named `x`; this represents the individual array member that is passed to the . 也請注意，本機`lBound`和`uBound`變數是 lambda 運算式內存取。Also note that the local `lBound` and `uBound` variables are accessible within the lambda expression. [!code-csharp[System.Array.FindAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.findall/cs/findall.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.FindAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.findall/vb/findall.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範， ，和泛型方法。The following code example demonstrates the , , and generic methods. 會建立字串陣列，包含 8 恐龍名稱，兩個 （在位置 1 和 5） 」 saurus 」 以結束。An array of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 程式碼範例也會定義名為的搜尋述詞方法`EndsWithSaurus`、 可接受字串參數和傳回布林值，指出是否"saurus"輸入的字串結尾。The code example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". 泛型方法會從開始，接著為傳遞每個項目來周遊陣列`EndsWithSaurus`方法。The generic method traverses the array from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 搜尋會停止時`EndsWithSaurus`方法會傳回`true`"Amargasaurus"的項目。The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for the element "Amargasaurus". > [!NOTE] > 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，就不需要建立`Predicate`委派 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 明確。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 這些語言推斷正確的委派，從內容，並自動建立。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically. 泛型的方法用來搜尋從結尾回溯陣列。The generic method is used to search the array backward from the end. 它會找到項目 」 Dilophosaurus 」 在位置 5。It finds the element "Dilophosaurus" at position 5. 泛型的方法用來傳回陣列，其中包含 「 saurus"結尾的所有項目。The generic method is used to return an array containing all the elements that end in "saurus". 所顯示的項目。The elements are displayed. 程式碼範例也示範和泛型方法。The code example also demonstrates the and generic methods. [!code-cpp[Array_FindEtAl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_FindEtAl/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_FindEtAl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_FindEtAl/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_FindEtAl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_FindEtAl/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜尋向前第一個項目開始和結束時間的最後一個元素。The is searched forward starting at the first element and ending at the last element. 委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 項目`array`分別傳遞至。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the . 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的所有三個多載泛型方法。The following code example demonstrates all three overloads of the generic method. 會建立字串陣列，包含 8 恐龍名稱，兩個 （在位置 1 和 5） 」 saurus 」 以結束。An array of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 程式碼範例也會定義名為的搜尋述詞方法`EndsWithSaurus`、 可接受字串參數和傳回布林值，指出是否"saurus"輸入的字串結尾。The code example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". 方法多載會從開始，接著為傳遞每個項目來周遊陣列`EndsWithSaurus`方法。The method overload traverses the array from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 搜尋會停止時`EndsWithSaurus`方法會傳回`true`位置 1 處的項目。The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for the element at position 1. > [!NOTE] > 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，就不需要建立`Predicate`委派 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 明確。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 這些語言推斷正確的委派，從內容，並自動建立。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically. 方法多載用來搜尋位置 2 開始，延續至陣列結尾的陣列。The method overload is used to search the array beginning at position 2 and continuing to the end of the array. 它會找到 5 處的項目。It finds the element at position 5. 最後，方法多載用來搜尋的位置 2 開始的三個項目範圍。Finally, the method overload is used to search the range of three elements beginning at position 2. 因為沒有在該範圍內恐龍名稱結尾是"saurus"，它會傳回-1。It returns –1 because there are no dinosaur names in that range that end with "saurus". [!code-cpp[Array_FindIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_FindIndex/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_FindIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_FindIndex/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_FindIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_FindIndex/vb/source.vb#1)]

Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的所有三個多載泛型方法。The following code example demonstrates all three overloads of the generic method. 會建立字串陣列，包含 8 恐龍名稱，兩個 （在位置 1 和 5） 」 saurus 」 以結束。An array of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 程式碼範例也會定義名為的搜尋述詞方法`EndsWithSaurus`、 可接受字串參數和傳回布林值，指出是否"saurus"輸入的字串結尾。The code example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". 方法多載會從開始，接著為傳遞每個項目來周遊陣列`EndsWithSaurus`方法。The method overload traverses the array from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 搜尋會停止時`EndsWithSaurus`方法會傳回`true`位置 1 處的項目。The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for the element at position 1. > [!NOTE] > 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，就不需要建立`Predicate`委派 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 明確。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 這些語言推斷正確的委派，從內容，並自動建立。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically. 方法多載用來搜尋位置 2 開始，延續至陣列結尾的陣列。The method overload is used to search the array beginning at position 2 and continuing to the end of the array. 它會找到 5 處的項目。It finds the element at position 5. 最後，方法多載用來搜尋的位置 2 開始的三個項目範圍。Finally, the method overload is used to search the range of three elements beginning at position 2. 因為沒有在該範圍內恐龍名稱結尾是"saurus"，它會傳回-1。It returns –1 because there are no dinosaur names in that range that end with "saurus". remarks.format: ## Remarks 開始向前搜尋`startIndex`結束為`startIndex`加上`count`減 1，如果`count`大於 0。The is searched forward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` plus `count` minus 1, if `count` is greater than 0. 委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 項目`array`分別傳遞至。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the . 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`count`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `count`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的所有三個多載泛型方法。The following code example demonstrates all three overloads of the generic method. 會建立字串陣列，包含 8 恐龍名稱，兩個 （在位置 1 和 5） 」 saurus 」 以結束。An array of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 程式碼範例也會定義名為的搜尋述詞方法`EndsWithSaurus`、 可接受字串參數和傳回布林值，指出是否"saurus"輸入的字串結尾。The code example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". 方法多載會從開始，接著為傳遞每個項目來周遊陣列`EndsWithSaurus`方法。The method overload traverses the array from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 搜尋會停止時`EndsWithSaurus`方法會傳回`true`位置 1 處的項目。The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for the element at position 1. > [!NOTE] > 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，就不需要建立`Predicate`委派 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 明確。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 這些語言推斷正確的委派，從內容，並自動建立。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically. 方法多載用來搜尋位置 2 開始，延續至陣列結尾的陣列。The method overload is used to search the array beginning at position 2 and continuing to the end of the array. 它會找到 5 處的項目。It finds the element at position 5. 最後，方法多載用來搜尋的位置 2 開始的三個項目範圍。Finally, the method overload is used to search the range of three elements beginning at position 2. 因為沒有在該範圍內恐龍名稱結尾是"saurus"，它會傳回-1。It returns –1 because there are no dinosaur names in that range that end with "saurus". remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 項目`array`分別傳遞至、 移動中回溯、 最後一個元素開始和結束的第一個元素。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the , moving backward in the , starting with the last element and ending with the first element. 找到相符項目時，會停止處理。Processing is stopped when a match is found. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範， ，和泛型方法。The following code example demonstrates the , , and generic methods. 會建立字串陣列，包含 8 恐龍名稱，兩個 （在位置 1 和 5） 」 saurus 」 以結束。An array of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 程式碼範例也會定義名為的搜尋述詞方法`EndsWithSaurus`、 可接受字串參數和傳回布林值，指出是否"saurus"輸入的字串結尾。The code example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". 泛型方法會從開始，接著為傳遞每個項目來周遊陣列`EndsWithSaurus`方法。The generic method traverses the array from the beginning, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 搜尋會停止時`EndsWithSaurus`方法會傳回`true`"Amargasaurus"的項目。The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for the element "Amargasaurus". > [!NOTE] > 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，就不需要建立`Predicate`委派 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 明確。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the`Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 這些語言推斷正確的委派，從內容，並自動建立。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically. 泛型的方法用來搜尋從結尾回溯陣列。The generic method is used to search the array backward from the end. 它會找到項目 」 Dilophosaurus 」 在位置 5。It finds the element "Dilophosaurus" at position 5. 泛型的方法用來傳回陣列，其中包含 「 saurus"結尾的所有項目。The generic method is used to return an array containing all the elements that end in "saurus". 所顯示的項目。The elements are displayed. 程式碼範例也示範和泛型方法。The code example also demonstrates the and generic methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 向後的最後一個項目開始和結束時間的第一個項目中搜尋。The is searched backward starting at the last element and ending at the first element. 委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。The is a delegate to a method that returns `true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 項目`array`分別傳遞至。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the . 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的所有三個多載泛型方法。The following code example demonstrates all three overloads of the generic method. 會建立字串陣列，包含 8 恐龍名稱，兩個 （在位置 1 和 5） 」 saurus 」 以結束。An array of strings is created, containing 8 dinosaur names, two of which (at positions 1 and 5) end with "saurus". 程式碼範例也會定義名為的搜尋述詞方法`EndsWithSaurus`、 可接受字串參數和傳回布林值，指出是否"saurus"輸入的字串結尾。The code example also defines a search predicate method named `EndsWithSaurus`, which accepts a string parameter and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the input string ends in "saurus". 方法多載周遊回溯陣列結束時，依序為傳遞每個項目從`EndsWithSaurus`方法。The method overload traverses the array backward from the end, passing each element in turn to the `EndsWithSaurus` method. 搜尋會停止時`EndsWithSaurus`方法會傳回`true`位置 5 處的項目。The search stops when the `EndsWithSaurus` method returns `true` for the element at position 5. > [!NOTE] > 在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，就不需要建立`Predicate`委派 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 明確。In C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 這些語言推斷正確的委派，從內容，並自動建立。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically. 方法多載用來搜尋位置 4 開始，並繼續向後陣列開頭的陣列。The method overload is used to search the array beginning at position 4 and continuing backward to the beginning of the array. 它會尋找在位置 1 的項目。It finds the element at position 1. 最後，方法多載用來搜尋的三個項目範圍從 4 位置開始並回溯 （也就是項目 4、 3 和 2）。Finally, the method overload is used to search the range of three elements beginning at position 4 and working backward (that is, elements 4, 3, and 2). 因為沒有在該範圍內恐龍名稱結尾是"saurus"，它會傳回-1。It returns –1 because there are no dinosaur names in that range that end with "saurus". summary.span: 傳回 的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + +`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉值對集合並沒有獨佔存取，因此列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用陣列的項目列出。The following code example shows how to use to list the elements of an array. [!code-cpp[System.Array_GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array_GetEnumerator/CPP/array_getenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Array_GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array_GetEnumerator/CS/array_getenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array_GetEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array_GetEnumerator/VB/array_getenumerator.vb#1)]

span.span: The index of the first element of the specified dimension in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetLowerBound(0)` 傳回陣列的第一個維度的起始索引和`GetLowerBound(Rank - 1)`傳回陣列的最後一個維度的起始索引。`GetLowerBound(0)` returns the starting index of the first dimension of the array, and `GetLowerBound(Rank - 1)` returns the starting index of the last dimension of the array. 方法一律會傳回值，指出索引陣列的下限即使陣列是空的。The method always returns a value that indicates the index of the lower bound of the array, even if the array is empty. 請注意，雖然大部分的陣列，在.NET Framework 是以零為起始 (也就是方法會傳回零的陣列，每個維度)，.NET Framework 支援不是以零為起始的陣列。Note that, although most arrays in the .NET Framework are zero-based (that is, the method returns zero for each dimension of an array), the .NET Framework does support arrays that are not zero-based. 您可以使用建立這類陣列方法，和也會傳回從 unmanaged 程式碼。Such arrays can be created with the method, and can also be returned from unmanaged code. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列範例會使用和方法以顯示一維和二維陣列的界限，並顯示其陣列元素的值。The following example uses the and methods to display the bounds of a one-dimensional and two-dimensional array and to display the values of their array elements. MemberSignature.Value: public static int IndexOf (Array array, object value);
.method public static hidebysig int32 IndexOf(class System.Array array, object value) cil managed
public: static int IndexOf(Array ^ array, System::Object ^ value);

param.name: array
param.span: 要搜尋的一維陣列。

span.span: The one-dimensional array to search.

param.name: value
param.span: 要在 array 中尋找的物件。

span.span: The object to locate in array.

summary.span: 搜尋指定的物件，並傳回一維陣列中第一個相符項目的索引。

span.span: Searches for the specified object and returns the index of its first occurrence in a one-dimensional array.

returns.span: 如有找到，則為 中 第一個相符項目的索引；否則為陣列的下限減 1。

span.span: The index of the first occurrence of in , if found; otherwise, the lower bound of the array minus 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會搜尋的一維 arrayfor 的所有項目`value`。This method searches all the elements of a one-dimensional arrayfor `value`. 若要判斷是否`value`存在於`array`，此方法會藉由呼叫每個項目執行相等比較`Equals`方法，直到找到相符項目。To determine whether `value` exists in `array`, the method performs an equality comparison by calling each element's `Equals` method until it finds a match. 這表示，如果項目會覆寫呼叫方法，覆寫。This means that if the element overrides the method, that override is called. 因為大部分的陣列都具有下限為零，這個方法通常會傳回 – 1 如果`value`找不到。Because most arrays have a lower bound of zero, this method generally returns –1 if`value` isn’t found. 在少數情況下，陣列的下限等於(0x80000000) 和`value`找不到，這個方法會傳回(0x7FFFFFFF)。In the rare case that the lower bound of the array is equal to (0x80000000) and `value` isn’t found, this method returns (0x7FFFFFFF). 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 此範例會呼叫下列三個多載的方法來尋找字串陣列中字串的索引：The example calls the following three overloads of the method to find the index of a string in a string array: - 以判斷第一個符合的字串"the"字串陣列中。, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in a string array. - 以判斷第一個符合的字串"the"中的第四個字串陣列的最後一個項目。, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in the fourth to the last elements of a string array. - 以判斷第一個符合的字串"the"中的字串陣列從陣列結尾後面次成功比對的項目。, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in a string array from the element that follows the last successful match to the end of the array. [!code-cpp[Classic Array.IndexOf Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.IndexOf Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Array.IndexOf Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.IndexOf Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Array.IndexOf Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.IndexOf Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

returns.span: 如有找到，則為 中從 延伸至最後一個元素的元素範圍內， 第一個發生的索引；否則為陣列的下限減 1。

span.span: The index of the first occurrence of , if it’s found, within the range of elements in that extends from to the last element; otherwise, the lower bound of the array minus 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會搜尋索引處的項目從一維陣列`startIndex`最後一個項目。This method searches a one-dimensional array from the element at index `startIndex` to the last element. 若要判斷是否`value`存在於`array`，此方法會藉由呼叫執行相等比較`Equals`方法的每個項目，直到找到相符項目。To determine whether `value` exists in `array`, the method performs an equality comparison by calling the `Equals` method of every element until it finds a match. 這表示，如果項目會覆寫呼叫方法，覆寫。This means that if the element overrides the method, that override is called. 因為大部分的陣列都具有下限為零，這個方法通常會傳回 – 1 如果`value`找不到。Because most arrays have a lower bound of zero, this method generally returns –1 if `value` isn’t found. 在少數情況下，陣列的下限等於(0x80000000) 和`value`找不到，這個方法會傳回(0x7FFFFFFF)。In the rare case that the lower bound of the array is equal to (0x80000000) and `value` isn’t found, this method returns (0x7FFFFFFF). 如果`startIndex`等於，方法會傳回-1。If `startIndex` equals ,the method returns -1. 如果`startIndex`大於，方法會擲回。If `startIndex` is greater than , the method throws an . 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是從元素數目`startIndex`結尾`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements from `startIndex` to the end of `array`. ## Examples 此範例會呼叫下列三個多載的方法來尋找字串陣列中字串的索引：The example calls the following three overloads of the method to find the index of a string in a string array: - 以判斷第一個符合的字串"the"字串陣列中。, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in a string array. - 以判斷第一個符合的字串"the"中的第四個字串陣列的最後一個項目。, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in the fourth to the last elements of a string array. - 以判斷第一個符合的字串"the"中的字串陣列從陣列結尾後面次成功比對的項目。, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in a string array from the element that follows the last successful match to the end of the array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會搜尋的一維 arrayfrom 項目`startIndex`至`startIndex`加上`count`減 1，如果`count`大於 0。This method searches the elements of a one-dimensional arrayfrom `startIndex` to `startIndex` plus `count` minus 1, if `count` is greater than 0. 若要判斷是否`value`存在於`array`，此方法會藉由呼叫執行相等比較`Equals`方法的每個項目，直到找到相符項目。To determine whether `value` exists in `array`, the method performs an equality comparison by calling the `Equals` method of every element until it finds a match. 這表示，如果項目會覆寫呼叫方法，覆寫。This means that if the element overrides the method, that override is called. Becausemost 陣列的下限為零，這個方法通常會傳回-1 時`value`找不到。Becausemost arrays have a lower bound of zero, this method generally returns –1 when `value` isn’t found. 在少數情況下，陣列的下限等於(0x80000000) 和`value`找不到，這個方法會傳回(0x7FFFFFFF)。In the rare case that the lower bound of the array is equal to (0x80000000) and `value` isn’t found, this method returns (0x7FFFFFFF). 如果`startindex`等於，方法會傳回-1。If `startindex` equals , the method returns -1. 如果`startIndex`大於，方法會擲回。If `startIndex` is greater than , the method throws an . 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`count`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `count`. ## Examples 此範例會呼叫下列三個多載的方法來尋找字串陣列中字串的索引：The example calls the following three overloads of the method to find the index of a string in a string array: - 以判斷第一個符合的字串"the"字串陣列中。, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in a string array. - 以判斷第一個符合的字串"the"中的第四個字串陣列的最後一個項目。, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in the fourth to the last elements of a string array. - 以判斷第一個符合的字串"the"中的字串陣列從陣列結尾後面次成功比對的項目。, to determine the first occurrence of the string "the" in a string array from the element that follows the last successful match to the end of the array. 若要判斷的值`count`引數，它減去從起始的索引陣列的上限，並新增一個。To determine the value of the `count` argument, it subtracts the upper bound of the array from the starting index and adds one.
