remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會搜尋的一維陣列的所有項目`value`。This method searches all the elements of a one-dimensional array for `value`. 若要判斷是否`value`存在於`array`，此方法會藉由呼叫執行相等比較`T.Equals`每個項目上的方法。To determine whether `value` exists in `array`, the method performs an equality comparison by calling the `T.Equals` method on every element. 這表示如果`T`會覆寫呼叫方法，覆寫。This means that if `T` overrides the method, that override is called. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下列範例將示範三種一般的所有多載方法。The following example demonstrates all three generic overloads of the method. 將建立字串陣列，一個會出現兩次，在索引位置 0 和 5 的索引位置的項目。An array of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5. 方法多載開始時，從陣列中搜尋和尋找字串的第一個項目。The method overload searches the array from the beginning, and finds the first occurrence of the string. 方法多載用於搜尋的索引位置 3 開頭的陣列和陣列的結尾繼續，並尋找字串的第二個項目。The method overload is used to search the array beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the end of the array, and finds the second occurrence of the string. 最後，方法多載用來搜尋指定範圍的開頭的索引位置 2 的兩個項目; 它會傳回 – 1，因為沒有在該範圍內的搜尋字串的執行個體。Finally, the method overload is used to search a range of two entries, beginning at index location two; it returns –1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會搜尋處的項目從一維陣列`startIndex`陣列的結尾。This method searches a one-dimensional array from the element at `startIndex` to the end of the array. 若要判斷是否`value`存在於`array`，此方法會藉由呼叫執行相等比較`T.Equals`每個項目上的方法。To determine whether `value` exists in `array`, the method performs an equality comparison by calling the `T.Equals` method on every element. 這表示如果`T`會覆寫呼叫方法，覆寫。This means that if `T` overrides the method, that override is called. 如果`startIndex`等於，方法會傳回-1.If`startIndex`大於，方法會擲回。If `startIndex` equals ,the method returns -1.If `startIndex` is greater than , the method throws an . 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是從元素數目`startIndex`結尾`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements from `startIndex` to the end of `array`. ## Examples 下列範例將示範三種一般的所有多載方法。The following example demonstrates all three generic overloads of the method. 將建立字串陣列，一個會出現兩次，在索引位置 0 和 5 的索引位置的項目。An array of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5. 方法多載開始時，從陣列中搜尋和尋找字串的第一個項目。The method overload searches the array from the beginning, and finds the first occurrence of the string. 方法多載用於搜尋的索引位置 3 開頭的陣列和陣列的結尾繼續，並尋找字串的第二個項目。The method overload is used to search the array beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the end of the array, and finds the second occurrence of the string. 最後，方法多載用來搜尋指定範圍的開頭的索引位置 2 的兩個項目; 它會傳回 – 1，因為沒有在該範圍內的搜尋字串的執行個體。Finally, the method overload is used to search a range of two entries, beginning at index location two; it returns –1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range. [!code-cpp[Array_IndexOf#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_IndexOf/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_IndexOf#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_IndexOf/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_IndexOf#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_IndexOf/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法被設計來協助編譯器支援實值型別陣列。大部分的使用者不需要這個方法。This method is designed to help compilers support value-type arrays; most users do not need this method. 它必須不能參考型別陣列上。It must not be used on reference-type arrays. 如果不是實值類型或實值型別沒有預設建構函式，如果則不會修改。If the is not a value-type or if the value type does not have a default constructor, the is not modified. 實值型別可以有任何的下限和任何數目的維度。The value-type can have any lower bound and any number of dimensions. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . > [!CAUTION] > 您可以使用這個方法只能在具有建構函式; 實值類型上不過，原生 C# 的實值類型沒有建構函式。You can use this method only on value types that have constructors; however, value types that are native to C# do not have constructors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作屬性因為的需要介面。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 具有固定大小陣列不允許在建立陣列，但允許修改現有的項目後新增或移除項目。An array with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the array is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

span.span: This property is always for all arrays.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作屬性因為的需要介面。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. 陣列是唯讀的不允許陣列建立後增加、 移除或修改項目。An array that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the array is created. 如果您需要唯讀集合，使用類別可實作介面。If you require a read-only collection, use a class that implements the interface. 如果您轉型或轉換至陣列介面物件屬性會傳回`false`。If you cast or convert an array to an interface object, the property returns `false`. 不過，如果您轉型或轉換至陣列介面，`IsReadOnly`屬性會傳回`true`。However, if you cast or convert an array to a interface, the `IsReadOnly` property returns `true`. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示對 的存取是否同步 (安全執行緒)。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 所有陣列的這個屬性永遠為 。

span.span: This property is always for all arrays.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作屬性因為的需要介面。 implements the property because it is required by the interface. .NET framework 類別根據提供自己的集合的同步化的版本屬性。.NET Framework classes based on provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the property. 使用陣列的類別也可以實作自己的同步處理使用屬性。Classes that use arrays can also implement their own synchronization using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須在上執行作業`SyncRoot`的集合，而不是直接在集合。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the `SyncRoot` of the collection, not directly on the collection. 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體而言，保持正常的同步處理與其他可能同時修改集合的執行緒。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection. 請注意，某些實作可能會傳回本身。Note that some implementations of might return the itself. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並不是執行緒安全的程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在整個列舉過程中鎖定陣列使用屬性。The following code example shows how to lock an array during the entire enumeration by using the property. [!code-cpp[System.Array.SyncRoot#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.SyncRoot/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Array.SyncRoot#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.SyncRoot/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.SyncRoot#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.SyncRoot/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一維向後的最後一個項目開始和結束時間的第一個項目中搜尋。The one-dimensional is searched backward starting at the last element and ending at the first element. 項目與指定的值使用方法。The elements are compared to the specified value using the method. 如果項目類型為非內建 （使用者定義） 的類型，`Equals`會使用該類型的實作。If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the `Equals` implementation of that type is used. 因為大部分的陣列都有下限為零，所以這個方法通常會傳回-1 時`value`找不到。Since most arrays will have a lower bound of zero, this method would generally return –1 when `value` is not found. 在少數情況下，陣列的下限等於和`value`找不到，這個方法會傳回，也就是`System.Int32.MinValue - 1`。In the rare case that the lower bound of the array is equal to and `value` is not found, this method returns , which is `System.Int32.MinValue - 1`. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，這個方法會使用和方法來判斷是否所指定`value`參數存在。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method uses the and methods of the to determine whether the specified by the `value` parameter exists. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，藉由進行這項判斷和方法`value`本身。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `value` itself. 方法的`item`參數集合中的物件。 methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何判斷陣列中指定的項目，最後一個出現的索引。The following code example shows how to determine the index of the last occurrence of a specified element in an array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一維是搜尋回溯開始`startIndex`結束為`startIndex`減去`count`再加上 1，如果`count`大於 0。The one-dimensional is searched backward starting at `startIndex` and ending at `startIndex` minus `count` plus 1, if `count` is greater than 0. 項目與指定的值使用方法。The elements are compared to the specified value using the method. 如果項目類型為非內建 （使用者定義） 的類型，`Equals`會使用該類型的實作。If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the`Equals` implementation of that type is used. 因為大部分的陣列都有下限為零，所以這個方法通常會傳回-1 時`value`找不到。Since most arrays will have a lower bound of zero, this method would generally return –1 when `value` is not found. 在少數情況下，陣列的下限等於和`value`找不到，這個方法會傳回，也就是`System.Int32.MinValue - 1`。In the rare case that the lower bound of the array is equal to and `value` is not found, this method returns , which is `System.Int32.MinValue - 1`. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`count`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `count`. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，這個方法會使用和方法來判斷是否所指定`value`參數存在。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method uses the and methods of the to determine whether the specified by the `value` parameter exists. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，藉由進行這項判斷和方法`value`本身。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `value` itself. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何判斷陣列中指定的項目，最後一個出現的索引。The following code example shows how to determine the index of the last occurrence of a specified element in an array. 請注意，方法是向後搜尋; 因此，`count`必須小於或等於 (`startIndex`陣列加 1 的下限減)。Note that the method is a backward search; therefore, `count` must be less than or equal to (`startIndex` minus the lower bound of the array plus 1). remarks.format: ## Remarks 向後的最後一個項目開始和結束時間的第一個項目中搜尋。The is searched backward starting at the last element and ending at the first element. 項目與指定的值使用方法。The elements are compared to the specified value using the method. 如果項目類型為非內建 （使用者定義） 的類型，`Equals`會使用該類型的實作。If the element type is a nonintrinsic (user-defined) type, the `Equals` implementation of that type is used. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範三種一般的所有多載方法。The following code example demonstrates all three generic overloads of the method. 將建立字串陣列，一個會出現兩次，在索引位置 0 和 5 的索引位置的項目。An array of strings is created, with one entry that appears twice, at index location 0 and index location 5. 方法多載整個結束時，從陣列中搜尋和尋找字串的第二個項目。The method overload searches the entire array from the end, and finds the second occurrence of the string. 方法多載用來與索引位置 3 回溯開始的陣列和陣列的開頭繼續搜尋和尋找字串的第一個項目。The method overload is used to search the array backward beginning with index location 3 and continuing to the beginning of the array, and finds the first occurrence of the string. 最後，方法多載用於範圍之四個項目，索引位置 4 開始，並擴充向後搜尋 （也就是說，它會搜尋的項目在位置 4、 3、 2 和 1）; 此搜尋會傳回 – 1，因為沒有搜尋的執行個體在該範圍內的字串。Finally, the method overload is used to search a range of four entries, beginning at index location 4 and extending backward (that is, it searches the items at locations 4, 3, 2, and 1); this search returns –1 because there are no instances of the search string in that range. span.span: The type of the elements of the array.

param.name: array
param.span: 要調整大小之以零為起始的一維陣列，或是 ，表示要以指定之大小建立新陣列。

param.name: newSize
param.span: 新陣列的大小。

span.span: The size of the new array.

summary.span: 將一維陣列中的項目數目變更為指定的新大小。

span.span: Changes the number of elements of a one-dimensional array to the specified new size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會配置新的陣列，以指定的大小、 從舊的陣列項目複製到新的專案，，然後以新的取代舊的陣列。This method allocates a new array with the specified size, copies elements from the old array to the new one, and then replaces the old array with the new one. `array` 必須是一維陣列。`array` must be a one-dimensional array. 如果`array`是`null`，這個方法會建立新的陣列，以指定的大小。If `array` is `null`, this method creates a new array with the specified size. 如果`newSize`大於的舊的陣列，會配置新的陣列和所有項目會從舊的陣列複製到新的專案。If `newSize` is greater than the of the old array, a new array is allocated and all the elements are copied from the old array to the new one. 如果`newSize`是小於的舊的陣列，會配置新的陣列和項目複製從舊的陣列轉換為新直到新的填滿; 舊陣列中元素的其餘部分會被忽略。If `newSize` is less than the of the old array, a new array is allocated and elements are copied from the old array to the new one until the new one is filled; the rest of the elements in the old array are ignored. 如果`newSize`等於的舊的陣列，這個方法不會執行任何動作。If `newSize` is equal to the of the old array, this method does nothing. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`newSize`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `newSize`. 方法調整大小，只是一維陣列。The method resizes a one-dimensional array only. 類別不包含調整大小的多維陣列的方法。The class does not include a method for resizing multi-dimensional arrays. 若要這樣做，您必須提供自己的程式碼，或呼叫協力廠商的文件庫中的特殊用途的方法。To do this, you must either provide your own code or call a special-purpose method in a third-party library. 下列程式碼將說明可能會調整大小的陣列方法實作*n*維度。The following code illustrates one possible implementation for a method that resizes an array of *n* dimensions. [!code-csharp[System.Array.Resize#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Resize/CS/resizexd.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Resize#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Resize/VB/resizexd.vb#2)] ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何調整大小會影響陣列。The following example shows how resizing affects the array. span.span: Reverses the sequence of the elements in the entire one-dimensional .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法，處的項目之後`myArray[i]`，其中`i`是陣列中的任何索引，將移至`myArray[j]`，其中`j`等於`(myArray.Length + myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - (i - myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - 1`。After a call to this method, the element at `myArray[i]`, where `i` is any index in the array, moves to `myArray[j]`, where `j` equals `(myArray.Length + myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - (i - myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - 1`. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. 如下列範例所示，方法可用來反向不規則的陣列。As the following example shows, the method can be used to reverse a jagged array. 它會初始化今年目前文化特性的日曆中的每個月的不規則的陣列，含有一個項目。It initializes a jagged array with one element for each month of the current year in the current culture's calendar. 每個項目包含與該月有天的元素的陣列。Each element contains an array with as many elements as that month has days. 此範例會顯示為陣列，呼叫的內容方法，然後按一下 顯示反轉陣列的內容。The example displays the contents of the array, calls the method, and then displays the contents of the reversed array. [!code-csharp[System.Array.Reverse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.reverse/cs/reversejagged.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Reverse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.reverse/vb/reversejagged.vb#1)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何反向中值的排序。The following code example shows how to reverse the sort of the values in an . [!code-cpp[Classic Array.Reverse Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.Reverse Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Array.Reverse Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.Reverse Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Array.Reverse Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Array.Reverse Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法，處的項目之後`myArray[i]`，其中`i`是陣列中的任何索引，將移至`myArray[j]`，其中`j`等於`(myArray.Length + myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - (i - myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - 1`。After a call to this method, the element at `myArray[i]`, where `i` is any index in the array, moves to `myArray[j]`, where `j` equals `(myArray.Length + myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - (i - myArray.GetLowerBound(0)) - 1`. 方法可用來反向不規則的陣列。The method can be used to reverse a jagged array. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `length`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何反向範圍中的項目中的值排序。The following code example shows how to reverse the sort of the values in a range of elements in an . remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法可以判斷是否值`index`超出範圍。The and methods can determine whether the value of `index` is out of bounds. 如需有關轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about conversions, see . 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. > [!NOTE] > 如果用來指派`null`實值類型陣列的項目，項目的所有欄位都初始化為零。If is used to assign `null` to an element of an array of value types, all fields of the element are initialized to zero. 元素的值不是 null 參考，並無法找到所搜尋的 null 參考。The value of the element is not a null reference, and cannot be found by searching for a null reference. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定並取得一維或多維陣列中的特定值。The following code example demonstrates how to set and get a specific value in a one-dimensional or multidimensional array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的項目數`indices`必須等於中的維度數目。The number of elements in `indices` must equal the number of dimensions in the . 中的所有項目`indices`陣列必須共同指定所需項目的位置，以多維度。All elements in the `indices` array must collectively specify the position of the desired element in the multidimensional . 和方法可以判斷是否有任何值的`indices`陣列超出界限。The and methods can determine whether any of the values in the `indices` array is out of bounds. 如需有關轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about conversions, see . 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. > [!NOTE] > 如果用來指派`null`實值類型陣列的項目，項目的所有欄位都初始化為零。If is used to assign `null` to an element of an array of value types, all fields of the element are initialized to zero. 元素的值不是 null 參考，並無法找到所搜尋的 null 參考。The value of the element is not a null reference, and cannot be found by searching for a null reference. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定並取得一維或多維陣列中的特定值。The following code example demonstrates how to set and get a specific value in a one-dimensional or multidimensional array. MemberSignature.Value: public static void Sort (Array array);
.method public static hidebysig void Sort(class System.Array array) cil managed
public: static void Sort(Array ^ array);

param.name: array
param.span: 要排序的一維 。

span.span: The one-dimensional to sort.

summary.span: 使用 的每個元素的 實作，排序整個一維 中的元素。

span.span: Sorts the elements in an entire one-dimensional using the implementation of each element of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個項目`array`必須實作介面中的項目比較能夠`array`。Each element of `array` must implement the interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`. 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an[insertion sort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果資料分割數目超過 2 \* 記錄N，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否則，它會使用[快速排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何排序值使用預設比較子和自訂比較子，會反轉排序順序。The following code example shows how to sort the values in an using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order. 請注意，結果可能會有所不同目前。Note that the result might vary depending on the current . [!code-cpp[System.Array.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort/CPP/arraysort.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Array.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort/CS/arraysort.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort/VB/arraysort.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用每個索引鍵的 實作，根據第一個 中的索引鍵，排序一對一維的 物件 (一個物件包含索引鍵，另一個物件包含對應的項目)。

span.span: Sorts a pair of one-dimensional objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first using the implementation of each key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每個索引鍵`keys`中有對應的項目`items` 。Each key in the `keys` has a corresponding item in the `items`. 索引鍵排序期間，在對應的項目時重新定位`items`同樣會重新調整位置。When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items` is similarly repositioned. 因此， `items` 根據對應中的索引鍵的排列方式排序`keys` 。Therefore, the `items` is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`. 在每個索引鍵`keys`必須實作介面若要能夠與每個索引鍵的比較。Each key in the `keys` must implement the interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key. 如果有多個項目與索引鍵，但不含對應的索引鍵的項目將不會排序，您可以排序。You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted. 如果有多個索引鍵項目，比無法排序如此一來，這會擲回。You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an . 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果資料分割數目超過 2 \* 記錄N，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否則，它會使用[快速排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`keys`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `keys`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何排序兩個相關聯的陣列，其中的第一個陣列包含的索引鍵，而第二個陣列包含的值。The following example shows how to sort two associated arrays where the first array contains the keys and the second array contains the values. 完成排序使用預設比較子和自訂比較子，會反轉排序順序。Sorts are done using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order. 請注意，結果可能會有所不同目前。Note that the result might vary depending on the current . [!code-cpp[System.Array.Sort2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort2/CPP/arraysort2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Array.Sort2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort2/CS/arraysort2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Sort2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort2/VB/arraysort2.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的 ，排序一維 中的元素。

span.span: Sorts the elements in a one-dimensional using the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`comparer`是`null`，每個項目`array`必須實作介面中的項目比較能夠`array`。If `comparer` is `null`, each element of `array` must implement the interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`. 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果資料分割數目超過 2 \* 記錄N，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否則，它會使用[快速排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. .NET Framework 包含預先定義實作如下表所示。The .NET Framework includes predefined implementations listed in the following table. |實作Implementation|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||比較任何兩個物件，但是執行不區分大小寫的字串比較。Compares any two objects, but performs a case-insensitive comparison of strings.| ||使用目前文化特性的排序慣例來比較任意兩個物件。Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the current culture.| ||比較任意兩個物件所使用的排序慣例的文化特性而異。Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the invariant culture.| ||比較兩個物件的型別`T`使用類型的預設排序順序。Compares two objects of type `T` by using the type's default sort order.| 您也可以藉由提供您自己的執行個體來支援自訂比較實作`comparer`參數。You can also support custom comparisons by providing an instance of your own implementation to the `comparer` parameter. 這個範例會藉由定義`ReverseComparer`反轉的預設排序順序的類別類型的執行個體和執行不區分大小寫字串的比較。The example does this by defining a `ReverseComparer` class that reverses the default sort order for instances of a type and performs case-insensitive string comparison. ## Examples 下列範例會排序中使用預設比較子字串 arrayby 的值。The following example sorts the values in a string arrayby using the default comparer. 它也會定義自訂實作名為`ReverseComparer`，反轉執行不區分大小寫字串比較物件的預設排序順序。It also defines a custom implementation named `ReverseComparer` that reverses an object's default sort order while performing a case-insensitive string comparison. 請注意，輸出可能會根據目前文化特性而有所不同。Note that the output might vary depending on the current culture. [!code-cpp[System.Array.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort/CPP/arraysort.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Array.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort/CS/arraysort.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort/VB/arraysort.vb#1)]

exception.span: 的實作在排序期間造成錯誤。

span.span: The implementation of caused an error during the sort.

exception.span: 例如，在將項目與其本身比較時， 可能不會傳回 0。

span.span: For example, might not return 0 when comparing an item with itself.

para.span: .NET Framework 4 和舊版使用快速排序演算法。

span.span: The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm.

para.span: 快速排序識別無效的比較子，在某些情況下，排序作業擲回例外狀況，並擲回例外狀況至呼叫端。

span.span: Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an exception, and throws an exception to the caller.

para.span: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，很可能擲回的先前排序作業不會擲回例外狀況，因為插入排序和 heapsort 演算法則不會偵測無效的比較子。

span.span: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previously threw will not throw an exception, because the insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer.

para.span: 大部分的情況下，這適用於具有 16 個元素的陣列。

span.span: For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.

span.span: Sorts a pair of one-dimensional objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first using the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每個索引鍵`keys`中有對應的項目`items` 。Each key in the `keys` has a corresponding item in the `items`. 索引鍵排序期間，在對應的項目時重新定位`items`同樣會重新調整位置。When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items` is similarly repositioned. 因此， `items` 根據對應中的索引鍵的排列方式排序`keys` 。Therefore, the `items` is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`. 如果`comparer`是`null`，每個索引鍵中`keys`必須實作介面若要能夠與每個索引鍵的比較。If `comparer` is `null`, each key in the `keys` must implement the interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key. 如果有多個項目與索引鍵，但不含對應的索引鍵的項目將不會排序，您可以排序。You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted. 如果有多個索引鍵項目，比無法排序如此一來，這會擲回。You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an . 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. .NET Framework 包含預先定義實作如下表所示。The .NET Framework includes predefined implementations listed in the following table. |實作Implementation|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||比較任何兩個物件，但是執行不區分大小寫的字串比較。Compares any two objects, but performs a case-insensitive comparison of strings.| ||使用目前文化特性的排序慣例來比較任意兩個物件。Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the current culture.| ||比較任意兩個物件所使用的排序慣例的文化特性而異。Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the invariant culture.| ||比較兩個物件的型別`T`使用類型的預設排序順序。Compares two objects of type `T` by using the type's default sort order.| 您也可以藉由提供您自己的執行個體來支援自訂比較實作`comparer`參數。You can also support custom comparisons by providing an instance of your own implementation to the `comparer` parameter. 這個範例會藉由定義的實作，保留預設排序順序，並執行不區分大小寫字串的比較。The example does this by defining an implementation that reverses the default sort order and performs case-insensitive string comparison. 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果資料分割數目超過 2 \* 記錄N，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否則，它會使用[快速排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`keys`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `keys`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何排序兩個相關聯的陣列，其中的第一個陣列包含的索引鍵，而第二個陣列包含的值。The following example shows how to sort two associated arrays where the first array contains the keys and the second array contains the values. 完成排序使用預設比較子和自訂比較子，會反轉排序順序。Sorts are done using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order. 請注意，結果可能會有所不同目前。Note that the result might vary depending on the current . [!code-cpp[System.Array.Sort2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort2/CPP/arraysort2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Array.Sort2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort2/CS/arraysort2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Sort2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort2/VB/arraysort2.vb#1)]

span.span: The implementation of caused an error during the sort.

span.span: For example, might not return 0 when comparing an item with itself.

span.span: is , and one or more elements in the do not implement the interface.

para.span: .NET Framework 4 和舊版使用快速排序演算法。

span.span: The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm.

para.span: 快速排序識別無效的比較子，在某些情況下，排序作業擲回例外狀況，並擲回例外狀況至呼叫端。

span.span: Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an exception, and throws an exception to the caller.

para.span: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，很可能的排序作業該 previouslythrew不會擲回例外狀況，因為插入排序和 heapsort 演算法則不會偵測無效的比較子。

span.span: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previouslythrew will not throw an exception, becausethe insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer.

para.span: 大部分的情況下，這適用於具有 16 個元素的陣列。

span.span: For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的項目指定的範圍內的每個項目`array`必須實作介面中的項目比較能夠`array`。Each element within the specified range of elements in `array` must implement the interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`. 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果資料分割數目超過 2 \* 記錄N，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否則，它會使用[快速排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何排序值使用預設比較子和自訂比較子，會反轉排序順序。The following code example shows how to sort the values in an using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order. 請注意，結果可能會有所不同目前。Note that the result might vary depending on the current . [!code-cpp[System.Array.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort/CPP/arraysort.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Array.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort/CS/arraysort.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Sort#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort/VB/arraysort.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`comparer`是`null`，每個項目中的項目指定的範圍內`array`必須實作介面中的項目比較能夠`array`。If `comparer` is `null`, each element within the specified range of elements in `array` must implement the interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`. 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. .NET Framework 包含預先定義實作如下表所示。The .NET Framework includes predefined implementations listed in the following table. |實作Implementation|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||比較任何兩個物件，但是執行不區分大小寫的字串比較。Compares any two objects, but performs a case-insensitive comparison of strings.| ||使用目前文化特性的排序慣例來比較任意兩個物件。Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the current culture.| ||比較任意兩個物件所使用的排序慣例的文化特性而異。Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the invariant culture.| ||比較兩個物件的型別`T`使用類型的預設排序順序。Compares two objects of type `T` by using the type's default sort order.| 您也可以藉由提供您自己的執行個體來支援自訂比較實作`comparer`參數。You can also support custom comparisons by providing an instance of your own implementation to the `comparer` parameter. 這個範例會藉由定義`ReverseComparer`反轉的預設排序順序的類別類型的執行個體和執行不區分大小寫字串的比較。The example does this by defining a `ReverseComparer` class that reverses the default sort order for instances of a type and performs case-insensitive string comparison. 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果資料分割數目超過 2 \* 記錄N，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否則，它會使用[快速排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何排序值使用預設比較子和自訂比較子，會反轉排序順序。The following code example shows how to sort the values in an using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order. 請注意，結果可能會有所不同目前。Note that the result might vary depending on the current . .method public static hidebysig void Sort(class System.Array keys, class System.Array items, int32 index, int32 length, class System.Collections.IComparer comparer) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Sort (keys As Array, items As Array, index As Integer, length As Integer, comparer As IComparer)
public: static void Sort(Array ^ keys, Array ^ items, int index, int length, System::Collections::IComparer ^ comparer);

param.name: keys
param.span: 一維 ，包含要排序的索引鍵。

span.span: The one-dimensional that contains the keys to sort.

param.name: items
param.span: 一維 ，包含對應至 keys 中每個索引鍵的項目。

span.span: The one-dimensional that contains the items that correspond to each of the keys in the keys.
-or-

param.span: 表示只排序 keys。

span.span: to sort only the keys.

param.name: index
param.span: 要排序之範圍的起始索引。

span.span: The starting index of the range to sort.

param.name: length
param.span: 區段中要排序的項目數目。

span.span: The number of elements in the range to sort.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 比較項目時所要使用的 實作。

span.span: The implementation to use when comparing elements.
-or-

param.span: 表示會使用每個項目的 實作。

span.span: to use the implementation of each element.

summary.span: 使用指定的 ，根據第一個 中的索引鍵，排序一對一維的 物件中某範圍的元素 (一個物件包含索引鍵，另一個物件包含對應的項目)。

span.span: Sorts a range of elements in a pair of one-dimensional objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first using the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每個索引鍵`keys`中有對應的項目`items` 。Each key in the `keys` has a corresponding item in the `items`. 索引鍵排序期間，在對應的項目時重新定位`items`同樣會重新調整位置。When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items` is similarly repositioned. 因此， `items` 根據對應中的索引鍵的排列方式排序`keys` 。Therefore, the `items` is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`. 如果`comparer`是`null`，每個索引鍵的項目中指定的範圍內`keys`必須實作介面若要能夠與每個索引鍵的比較。If `comparer` is `null`, each key within the specified range of elements in the `keys` must implement the interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key. 如果有多個項目與索引鍵，但不含對應的索引鍵的項目將不會排序，您可以排序。You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted. 如果有多個索引鍵項目，比無法排序如此一來，這會擲回。You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an . 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. .NET Framework 包含預先定義實作如下表所示。The .NET Framework includes predefined implementations listed in the following table. |實作Implementation|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||比較任何兩個物件，但是執行不區分大小寫的字串比較。Compares any two objects, but performs a case-insensitive comparison of strings.| ||使用目前文化特性的排序慣例來比較任意兩個物件。Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the current culture.| ||比較任意兩個物件所使用的排序慣例的文化特性而異。Compares any two objects by using the sorting conventions of the invariant culture.| ||比較兩個物件的型別`T`使用類型的預設排序順序。Compares two objects of type `T` by using the type's default sort order.| 您也可以藉由提供您自己的執行個體來支援自訂比較實作`comparer`參數。You can also support custom comparisons by providing an instance of your own implementation to the `comparer` parameter. 這個範例會藉由定義自訂的實作，保留預設排序順序，並執行不區分大小寫字串的比較。The example does this by defining a custom implementation that reverses the default sort order and performs case-insensitive string comparison. 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果資料分割數目超過 2 \* 記錄N，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否則，它會使用[快速排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何排序兩個相關聯的陣列，其中的第一個陣列包含的索引鍵，而第二個陣列包含的值。The following code example shows how to sort two associated arrays where the first array contains the keys and the second array contains the values. 完成排序使用預設比較子和自訂比較子，會反轉排序順序。Sorts are done using the default comparer and a custom comparer that reverses the sort order. 請注意，結果可能會有所不同目前。Note that the result might vary depending on the current . [!code-cpp[System.Array.Sort2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort2/CPP/arraysort2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Array.Sort2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort2/CS/arraysort2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.Sort2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.Sort2/VB/arraysort2.vb#1)]

para.span: .NET Framework 4 和舊版使用快速排序演算法。

span.span: The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm.

para.span: 快速排序識別無效的比較子，在某些情況下，排序作業擲回例外狀況，並擲回例外狀況至呼叫端。

span.span: Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an exception, and throws an exception to the caller.

para.span: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，很可能擲回的先前排序作業不會擲回例外狀況，因為插入排序和 heapsort 演算法則不會偵測無效的比較子。

span.span: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previously threw will not throw an exception, because the insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer.

para.span: 大部分的情況下，這適用於具有 16 個元素的陣列。

span.span: For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.

param.span: 要排序之以零起始的一維 。

span.span: The one-dimensional, zero-based to sort.

summary.span: 使用 的每個元素之 泛型介面實作，排序整個 中的元素。

span.span: Sorts the elements in an entire using the generic interface implementation of each element of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個項目`array`必須實作泛型介面中的項目比較能夠`array`。Each element of `array` must implement the generic interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`. 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果資料分割數目超過 2 \* 記錄N，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否則，它會使用[快速排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範泛型方法的多載而泛型方法的多載。The following code example demonstrates the generic method overload and the generic method overload. 建立字串陣列，不依特定順序。An array of strings is created, in no particular order. 陣列會顯示、 已排序，並且會再次顯示。The array is displayed, sorted, and displayed again. > [!NOTE] > 若要呼叫和泛型方法看起來不任何不同於呼叫其非泛型對應項目，因為 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 推斷的第一個引數類型的泛型型別參數的型別。The calls to the and generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first argument. 如果您使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要檢查的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)，您可以查看呼叫泛型方法。If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called. 泛型方法的多載然後來搜尋兩個字串，而非在陣列與其中一個，為。The generic method overload is then used to search for two strings, one that is not in the array and one that is. 陣列和傳回值方法會傳遞至`ShowWhere`泛型的方法，如果找到字串，否則項目搜尋字串會介於陣列中時顯示的索引值。The array and the return value of the method are passed to the `ShowWhere` generic method, which displays the index value if the string is found, and otherwise the elements the search string would fall between if it were in the array. 索引是負值，如果字串不是 n 陣列，所以`ShowWhere`方法會採用的位元補數 (~ 運算子，在 C# 和 Visual c + +，`Xor`在 Visual Basic 中的為-1) 取得第一個元素大於搜尋 stri 清單中的索引ng。The index is negative if the string is not n the array, so the `ShowWhere` method takes the bitwise complement (the ~ operator in C# and Visual C++, `Xor` -1 in Visual Basic) to obtain the index of the first element in the list that is larger than the search string. [!code-cpp[Array_SortSearch#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortSearch/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_SortSearch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortSearch/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_SortSearch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortSearch/vb/source.vb#1)]

arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範泛型方法的多載而泛型方法的多載。The following code example demonstrates the generic method overload and the generic method overload. 程式碼範例定義的替代的比較子字串，名為`ReverseCompare`，它會實作`IComparer`(`IComparer(Of Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 比較子的呼叫方法，使字串排序高-到-低而不是低到高反轉比較元的順序。The comparer calls the method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high. 陣列會顯示、 已排序，並且會再次顯示。The array is displayed, sorted, and displayed again. 必須排序陣列，才能使用方法。Arrays must be sorted in order to use the method. > [!NOTE] > remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：This method uses introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果資料分割數目超過 2 \* 記錄N，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否則，它會使用[快速排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範方法多載。The following code example demonstrates the method overload. 程式碼範例會定義具名字串的替代的比較方法`CompareDinosByLength`。The code example defines an alternative comparison method for strings, named `CompareDinosByLength`. 這個方法的運作方式如下： comparandsare 先，測試`null`，而且 null 的參考被視為小於一個非 null。This method works as follows: First, the comparandsare tested for`null`, and a null reference is treated as less than a non-null. 第二，進行比較的字串長度，以及較長的字串會視為大於。Second, the string lengths are compared, and the longer string is deemed to be greater. 第三，如果長度相等，則使用一般的字串比較。Third, if the lengths are equal, ordinary string comparison is used. 建立並填入不依特定順序中的四個字串的字串陣列。A array of strings is created and populated with four strings, in no particular order. 清單也會包含空字串和 null 參考。The list also includes an empty string and a null reference. 清單會顯示使用排序代表的泛型委派`CompareDinosByLength`方法，並顯示一次。The list is displayed, sorted using a generic delegate representing the `CompareDinosByLength` method, and displayed again. [!code-cpp[Array_SortComparison#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortComparison/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_SortComparison#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortComparison/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_SortComparison#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortComparison/vb/source.vb#1)]

is .

exception.span: 的實作在排序期間造成錯誤。

span.span: The implementation of caused an error during the sort.

exception.span: 例如，在將項目與其本身比較時， 可能不會傳回 0。

span.span: For example, might not return 0 when comparing an item with itself.

para.span: .NET Framework 4 和舊版使用快速排序演算法。

span.span: The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm.

para.span: 快速排序識別無效的比較子，在某些情況下，排序作業擲回例外狀況，並擲回例外狀況至呼叫端。

span.span: Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an exception, and throws an exception to the caller.

para.span: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，很可能擲回的先前排序作業不會擲回例外狀況，因為插入排序和 heapsort 演算法則不會偵測無效的比較子。

span.span: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previously threw will not throw an exception, because the insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer.

para.span: 大部分的情況下，這適用於具有 16 個元素的陣列。

span.span: For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.

span.span: Sorts the elements in a range of elements in an using the generic interface implementation of each element of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的項目指定的範圍內的每個項目`array`必須實作泛型介面中的項目比較能夠`array`。Each element within the specified range of elements in `array` must implement the generic interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`. 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果資料分割數目超過 2 \* 記錄N，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否則，它會使用[快速排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範泛型方法的多載而泛型方法的多載來排序陣列中的範圍。The following code example demonstrates the generic method overload and the generic method overload for sorting a range in an array. 程式碼範例定義的替代的比較子字串，名為`ReverseCompare`，它會實作`IComparer`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中`IComparer`Visual c + +) 泛型介面。The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 比較子的呼叫方法，使字串排序高-到-低而不是低到高反轉比較元的順序。The comparer calls the method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high. 程式碼範例會建立，並顯示恐龍名稱，後面接著三個肉食性恐龍 (更明確地說 tyrannosaurids) 的三個草食所組成的陣列。The code example creates and displays an array of dinosaur names, consisting of three herbivores followed by three carnivores (tyrannosaurids, to be precise). 泛型方法的多載會用來排序的陣列，接著會顯示最後三個項目。The generic method overload is used to sort the last three elements of the array, which is then displayed. 泛型方法的多載會搭配`ReverseCompare`以相反順序排序的最後三個項目。The generic method overload is used with `ReverseCompare` to sort the last three elements in reverse order. 恐龍會再次顯示。The thoroughly confused dinosaurs are displayed again. > [!NOTE] > 若要呼叫和泛型方法看起來不任何不同於呼叫其非泛型對應項目，因為 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 推斷的第一個引數類型的泛型型別參數的型別。The calls to the and generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first argument. 如果您使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要檢查的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)，您可以查看呼叫泛型方法。If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called. [!code-cpp[Array_SortIntIntIComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortIntIntIComparer/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_SortIntIntIComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortIntIntIComparer/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_SortIntIntIComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_SortIntIntIComparer/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`comparer`是`null`，每個項目中的項目指定的範圍內`array`必須實作泛型介面中的項目比較能夠`array`。If `comparer` is `null`, each element within the specified range of elements in `array` must implement the generic interface to be capable of comparisons with every other element in `array`. 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果資料分割數目超過 2 \* 記錄N，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否則，它會使用[快速排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範泛型方法的多載而泛型方法的多載來排序陣列中的範圍。The following code example demonstrates the generic method overload and the generic method overload for sorting a range in an array. 程式碼範例定義的替代的比較子字串，名為`ReverseCompare`，它會實作`IComparer`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中`IComparer`Visual c + +) 泛型介面。The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 比較子的呼叫方法，使字串排序高-到-低而不是低到高反轉比較元的順序。The comparer calls the method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high. 程式碼範例會建立，並顯示恐龍名稱，後面接著三個肉食性恐龍 (更明確地說 tyrannosaurids) 的三個草食所組成的陣列。The code example creates and displays an array of dinosaur names, consisting of three herbivores followed by three carnivores (tyrannosaurids, to be precise). 泛型方法的多載會用來排序的陣列，接著會顯示最後三個項目。The generic method overload is used to sort the last three elements of the array, which is then displayed. 泛型方法的多載會搭配`ReverseCompare`以相反順序排序的最後三個項目。The generic method overload is used with `ReverseCompare` to sort the last three elements in reverse order. 恐龍會再次顯示。The thoroughly confused dinosaurs are displayed again. > [!NOTE] > 若要呼叫和泛型方法看起來不任何不同於呼叫其非泛型對應項目，因為 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 推斷的第一個引數類型的泛型型別參數的型別。The calls to the and generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first argument. 如果您使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要檢查的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)，您可以查看呼叫泛型方法。If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called. The type of the elements of the items array.

summary.span: 使用每個索引鍵的 泛型介面實作，根據第一個 中的索引鍵，排序一對 物件 (一個物件包含索引鍵，另一個物件包含對應的項目)。

span.span: Sorts a pair of objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first using the generic interface implementation of each key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每個索引鍵`keys`中有對應的項目`items` 。Each key in the `keys` has a corresponding item in the `items`. 索引鍵排序期間，在對應的項目時重新定位`items`同樣會重新調整位置。When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items` is similarly repositioned. 因此， `items` 根據對應中的索引鍵的排列方式排序`keys` 。Therefore, the `items` is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`. 在每個索引鍵`keys`必須實作能夠與每個索引鍵比較的泛型介面。Each key in the `keys` must implement the generic interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key. 如果有多個項目與索引鍵，但不含對應的索引鍵的項目將不會排序，您可以排序。You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted. 如果有多個索引鍵項目，比無法排序如此一來，這會擲回。You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an . 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果資料分割數目超過 2 \* 記錄N，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否則，它會使用[快速排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範， ， ，和泛型方法的多載，來排序的陣列，代表索引鍵和值組。The following code example demonstrates the , , , and generic method overloads, for sorting pairs of arrays that represent keys and values. 程式碼範例定義的替代的比較子字串，名為`ReverseCompare`，它會實作`IComparer`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中`IComparer`Visual c + +) 泛型介面。The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 比較子的呼叫方法，使字串排序高-到-低而不是低到高反轉比較元的順序。The comparer calls the method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high. 程式碼範例會建立，並顯示恐龍名稱 （索引鍵） 的陣列，表示每個恐龍以公尺為單位 （值） 的最大長度的整數陣列。The code example creates and displays an array of dinosaur names (the keys) and an array of integers representing the maximum length of each dinosaur in meters (the values). 然後排序和顯示數次的陣列：The arrays are then sorted and displayed several times: - 多載會用來排序順序中的第一個陣列恐龍名稱的兩個陣列。The overload is used to sort both arrays in order of the dinosaur names in the first array. - 多載和執行個體`ReverseCompare`用來反轉排序次序的配對的陣列。The overload and an instance of `ReverseCompare` are used to reverse the sort order of the paired arrays. - 多載會用來排序的兩個陣列的最後三個項目。The overload is used to sort the last three elements of both arrays. - 多載用來以相反順序排序的兩個陣列的最後三個項目。The overload is used to sort the last three elements of both arrays in reverse order. > [!NOTE] > 與泛型方法的呼叫不要尋找任何不同於呼叫其非泛型對應項目，因為 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 推斷的前兩個引數類型的泛型型別參數的型別。The calls to the generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first two arguments. 如果您使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要檢查的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)，您可以查看呼叫泛型方法。If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called. [!code-cpp[Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Sort<TKey,TValue> (TKey[] keys, TValue[] items, System.Collections.Generic.IComparer<TKey> comparer);
.method public static hidebysig void Sort<TKey, TValue>(!!TKey[] keys, !!TValue[] items, class System.Collections.Generic.IComparer`1<!!TKey> comparer) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Sort(Of TKey, TValue) (keys As TKey(), items As TValue(), comparer As IComparer(Of TKey))

typeparam.name: TKey
typeparam.span: 索引鍵陣列項目的類型。

span.span: The type of the elements of the key array.
The type of the elements of the items array.

param.name: keys
param.span: 一維、以零起始的 ，包含要排序的索引鍵。

span.span: The one-dimensional, zero-based that contains the keys to sort.

param.name: items
param.span: 包含 keys 中的索引鍵對應項目，且以零為起始的一維 ； 則表示只會排序 keys。

span.span: The one-dimensional, zero-based that contains the items that correspond to the keys in keys, or to sort only keys.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 在比較項目時所使用的 泛型介面實作，或是 以使用每個項目的 泛型介面實作。

span.span: The generic interface implementation to use when comparing elements, or to use the generic interface implementation of each element.

summary.span: 使用指定的 泛型介面，根據第一個 中的索引鍵，排序一對 物件 (一個物件包含索引鍵，另一個物件包含對應的項目)。

span.span: Sorts a pair of objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first using the specified generic interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每個索引鍵`keys`中有對應的項目`items` 。Each key in the `keys` has a corresponding item in the `items`. 索引鍵排序期間，在對應的項目時重新定位`items`同樣會重新調整位置。When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items` is similarly repositioned. 因此， `items` 根據對應中的索引鍵的排列方式排序`keys` 。Therefore, the `items` is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`. 如果`comparer`是`null`，每個索引鍵中`keys`必須實作能夠與每個索引鍵比較的泛型介面。If `comparer` is `null`, each key in the `keys` must implement the generic interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key. 如果有多個項目與索引鍵，但不含對應的索引鍵的項目將不會排序，您可以排序。You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted. 如果有多個索引鍵項目，比無法排序如此一來，這會擲回。You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an . 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果資料分割數目超過 2 \* 記錄N，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否則，它會使用[快速排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範，[\]，Tvalue>\，，和泛型方法的多載，來排序的陣列，代表索引鍵和值組。The following code example demonstrates the , [\], TValue\,, and generic method overloads, for sorting pairs of arrays that represent keys and values. 程式碼範例定義的替代的比較子字串，名為`ReverseCompare`，它會實作`IComparer`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中`IComparer`Visual c + +) 泛型介面。The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 比較子的呼叫方法，使字串排序高-到-低而不是低到高反轉比較元的順序。The comparer calls the method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high. 程式碼範例會建立，並顯示恐龍名稱 （索引鍵） 的陣列，表示每個恐龍以公尺為單位 （值） 的最大長度的整數陣列。The code example creates and displays an array of dinosaur names (the keys) and an array of integers representing the maximum length of each dinosaur in meters (the values). 然後排序和顯示數次的陣列：The arrays are then sorted and displayed several times: - 多載會用來排序順序中的第一個陣列恐龍名稱的兩個陣列。The overload is used to sort both arrays in order of the dinosaur names in the first array. - [\]，Tvalue>\ 多載和執行個體`ReverseCompare`用來反轉排序次序配對的陣列。The [\], TValue\ overload and an instance of `ReverseCompare` are used to reverse the sort order of the paired arrays. - 多載會用來排序的兩個陣列的最後三個項目。The overload is used to sort the last three elements of both arrays. - 多載用來以相反順序排序的兩個陣列的最後三個項目。The overload is used to sort the last three elements of both arrays in reverse order. > [!NOTE] > 與泛型方法的呼叫不要尋找任何不同於呼叫其非泛型對應項目，因為 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 推斷的前兩個引數類型的泛型型別參數的型別。The calls to the generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first two arguments. 如果您使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要檢查的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)，您可以查看呼叫泛型方法。If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called. span.span: The implementation of caused an error during the sort.

exception.span: 例如，在將項目與其本身比較時， 可能不會傳回 0。

span.span: For example, might not return 0 when comparing an item with itself.

exception.span: 為 ，而且 中的一或多個元素未實作 泛型介面。

span.span: is , and one or more elements in the do not implement the generic interface.

para.span: .NET Framework 4 和舊版使用快速排序演算法。

span.span: The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm.

para.span: 快速排序識別無效的比較子，在某些情況下，排序作業擲回例外狀況，並擲回例外狀況至呼叫端。

span.span: Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an exception, and throws an exception to the caller.

para.span: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，很可能擲回的先前排序作業不會擲回例外狀況，因為插入排序和 heapsort 演算法則不會偵測無效的比較子。

span.span: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previously threw will not throw an exception, because the insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer.

para.span: 大部分的情況下，這適用於具有 16 個元素的陣列。

span.span: For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.

span.span: Sorts a range of elements in a pair of objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first using the generic interface implementation of each key.

如果資料分割數目超過 2 \* 記錄N，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否則，它會使用[快速排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範， ，[\]，Tvalue>\，並泛型方法的多載，排序的陣列，代表索引鍵和值組。The following code example demonstrates the , , [\], TValue\, and generic method overloads, for sorting pairs of arrays that represent keys and values. 程式碼範例定義的替代的比較子字串，名為`ReverseCompare`，它會實作`IComparer`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中`IComparer`Visual c + +) 泛型介面。The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer` (`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 比較子的呼叫方法，使字串排序高-到-低而不是低到高反轉比較元的順序。The comparer calls the method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high. 程式碼範例會建立，並顯示恐龍名稱 （索引鍵） 的陣列，表示每個恐龍以公尺為單位 （值） 的最大長度的整數陣列。The code example creates and displays an array of dinosaur names (the keys) and an array of integers representing the maximum length of each dinosaur in meters (the values). 然後排序和顯示數次的陣列：The arrays are then sorted and displayed several times: - Public Shared Sub Sort(Of TKey, TValue) (keys As TKey(), items As TValue(), index As Integer, length As Integer, comparer As IComparer(Of TKey))
