typeparam.span: 索引鍵陣列項目的類型。

span.span: The type of the elements of the key array.
The type of the elements of the items array.

param.name: keys
param.span: 一維、以零起始的 ，包含要排序的索引鍵。

span.span: The one-dimensional, zero-based that contains the keys to sort.

param.name: items
param.span: 包含 keys 中的索引鍵對應項目，且以零為起始的一維 ； 則表示只會排序 keys。

span.span: The one-dimensional, zero-based that contains the items that correspond to the keys in keys, or to sort only keys.

param.name: index
param.span: 要排序之範圍的起始索引。

span.span: The starting index of the range to sort.

param.name: length
param.span: 區段中要排序的項目數目。

span.span: The number of elements in the range to sort.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 在比較項目時所使用的 泛型介面實作，或是 以使用每個項目的 泛型介面實作。

span.span: The generic interface implementation to use when comparing elements, or to use the generic interface implementation of each element.

summary.span: 使用指定的 泛型介面，根據第一個 中的索引鍵，排序一對 物件中某範圍的元素 (一個物件包含索引鍵，另一個物件包含對應的項目)。

span.span: Sorts a range of elements in a pair of objects (one contains the keys and the other contains the corresponding items) based on the keys in the first using the specified generic interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每個索引鍵`keys`中有對應的項目`items` 。Each key in the `keys` has a corresponding item in the `items`. 索引鍵排序期間，在對應的項目時重新定位`items`同樣會重新調整位置。When a key is repositioned during the sorting, the corresponding item in the `items` is similarly repositioned. 因此， `items` 根據對應中的索引鍵的排列方式排序`keys` 。Therefore, the `items` is sorted according to the arrangement of the corresponding keys in the `keys`. 如果`comparer`是`null`，每個索引鍵的項目中指定的範圍內`keys`必須實作能夠與每個索引鍵比較的泛型介面。If `comparer` is `null`, each key within the specified range of elements in the `keys` must implement the generic interface to be capable of comparisons with every other key. 如果有多個項目與索引鍵，但不含對應的索引鍵的項目將不會排序，您可以排序。You can sort if there are more items than keys, but the items that have no corresponding keys will not be sorted. 如果有多個索引鍵項目，比無法排序如此一來，這會擲回。You cannot sort if there are more keys than items; doing this throws an . 如果未順利完成排序，則結果會是未定義。If the sort is not successfully completed, the results are undefined. 這個方法會使用內省式排序 (introsort) 演算法，如下所示：This method uses the introspective sort (introsort) algorithm as follows: - 如果磁碟分割大小是 16 個元素，它會使用[插入排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort)演算法。If the partition size is fewer than 16 elements, it uses an [insertion sort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insertion_sort) algorithm. - 如果資料分割數目超過 2 \* 記錄N，其中*N*為範圍之輸入的陣列，它會使用[Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort)演算法。If the number of partitions exceeds 2 \* LogN, where *N* is the range of the input array, it uses a [Heapsort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heapsort) algorithm. - 否則，它會使用[快速排序](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort)演算法。Otherwise, it uses a [Quicksort](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quicksort) algorithm. 此實作會執行不穩定的排序。也就是說，如果兩個項目相同，可能不會保留它們的順序。This implementation performs an unstable sort; that is, if two elements are equal, their order might not be preserved. 相較之下，穩定的排序會保留相同的項目的順序。In contrast, a stable sort preserves the order of elements that are equal. 對於使用 Heapsort 和快速排序演算法，最壞的情況下會排序的陣列，這個方法是 O (`n`記錄`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`length`。For arrays that are sorted by using the Heapsort and Quicksort algorithms, in the worst case, this method is an O(`n` log `n`) operation, where `n` is `length`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範， ， ，和 [\]，Tvalue>\ 泛型方法的多載，來排序的陣列，代表索引鍵和值組。The following code example demonstrates the , , , and [\], TValue\ generic method overloads, for sorting pairs of arrays that represent keys and values. 程式碼範例定義的替代的比較子字串，名為`ReverseCompare`，它會實作`IComparer`(`IComparer(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中`IComparer`Visual c + +) 泛型介面。The code example defines an alternative comparer for strings, named `ReverseCompare`, which implements the `IComparer`(`IComparer(Of String)` in Visual Basic, `IComparer` in Visual C++) generic interface. 比較子的呼叫方法，使字串排序高-到-低而不是低到高反轉比較元的順序。The comparer calls the method, reversing the order of the comparands so that the strings sort high-to-low instead of low-to-high. 程式碼範例會建立，並顯示恐龍名稱 （索引鍵） 的陣列，表示每個恐龍以公尺為單位 （值） 的最大長度的整數陣列。The code example creates and displays an array of dinosaur names (the keys) and an array of integers representing the maximum length of each dinosaur in meters (the values). 然後排序和顯示數次的陣列：The arrays are then sorted and displayed several times: - 多載會用來排序順序中的第一個陣列恐龍名稱的兩個陣列。The overload is used to sort both arrays in order of the dinosaur names in the first array. - 多載和執行個體`ReverseCompare`用來反轉排序次序的配對的陣列。The overload and an instance of `ReverseCompare` are used to reverse the sort order of the paired arrays. - 多載會用來排序的兩個陣列的最後三個項目。The overload is used to sort the last three elements of both arrays. - [\]，Tvalue>\ 用來排序最後三個多載兩者的項目陣列以反向順序。The [\], TValue\ overload is used to sort the last three elements of both arrays in reverse order. > [!NOTE] > 與泛型方法的呼叫不要尋找任何不同於呼叫其非泛型對應項目，因為 Visual Basic、 C# 和 c + + 推斷的前兩個引數類型的泛型型別參數的型別。The calls to the generic methods do not look any different from calls to their nongeneric counterparts, because Visual Basic, C#, and C++ infer the type of the generic type parameter from the type of the first two arguments. 如果您使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要檢查的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)，您可以查看呼叫泛型方法。If you use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL), you can see that the generic methods are being called. [!code-cpp[Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_Sort2IntIntIComparer/vb/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is , and one or more elements in the do not implement the generic interface.

para.span: .NET Framework 4 和舊版使用快速排序演算法。

span.span: The .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions used only the Quicksort algorithm.

para.span: 快速排序識別無效的比較子，在某些情況下，排序作業擲回例外狀況，並擲回例外狀況至呼叫端。

span.span: Quicksort identifies invalid comparers in some situations in which the sorting operation throws an exception, and throws an exception to the caller.

para.span: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，很可能擲回的先前排序作業不會擲回例外狀況，因為插入排序和 heapsort 演算法則不會偵測無效的比較子。

span.span: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], it is possible that sorting operations that previously threw will not throw an exception, because the insertion sort and heapsort algorithms do not detect an invalid comparer.

para.span: 大部分的情況下，這適用於具有 16 個元素的陣列。

span.span: For the most part, this applies to arrays with fewer than 16 elements.

.property instance object SyncRoot
Public ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object

summary.span: 取得可用以同步存取 的物件。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用以同步存取 的物件。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會實作介面。This property implements the interface. .NET framework 類別根據提供自己的集合的同步化的版本屬性。.NET Framework classes based on provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the property. 使用陣列的類別也可以實作自己的同步處理使用屬性。Classes that use arrays can also implement their own synchronization using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須在上執行作業`SyncRoot`的集合，而不是直接在集合。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the `SyncRoot` of the collection, not directly on the collection. 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體而言，保持正常的同步處理與其他可能同時修改集合的執行緒。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection. 請注意，某些實作可能會傳回本身。Note that some implementations of might return the itself. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並不是執行緒安全的程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在整個列舉過程中鎖定陣列使用屬性。The following code example shows how to lock an array during the entire enumeration by using the property. [!code-cpp[System.Array.SyncRoot#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.SyncRoot/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Array.SyncRoot#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.SyncRoot/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.SyncRoot#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Array.SyncRoot/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派的方法會傳回以`true`傳送至的物件是否符合在委派中定義的條件。The is a delegate to a method that returns`true` if the object passed to it matches the conditions defined in the delegate. 項目`array`分別傳遞至，並停止處理在委派傳回時`false`的任何項目。The elements of `array` are individually passed to the , and processing is stopped when the delegate returns `false` for any element. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是的`array`。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the of `array`. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷是否將字串陣列中每個元素的最後一個字元是數字。The following example determines whether the last character of each element in a string array is a number. 它會建立兩個字串陣列。It creates two string arrays. 第一個 arrayincludes 字串結尾為英數字元和字串與數字字元結尾。第二個陣列只包含結尾的數字字元的字串。The first arrayincludes both strings that end with alphabetic characters and strings that end with numeric characters.The second array consists only of strings that end with numeric characters. 此範例也會定義`EndWithANumber`方法的簽章符合委派。The example also defines an `EndWithANumber` method whose signature matches the delegate. 此範例會傳遞至每個陣列方法表示的委派，以及`EndsWithANumber`方法。The example passes each array to the method along with a delegate that represents the `EndsWithANumber` method. [!code-csharp[System.Array.TrueForAll#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.trueforall/cs/trueforall2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Array.TrueForAll#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.trueforall/vb/trueforall2.vb#2)] 下列範例是類似於第一個，不同之處在於它會將字串陣列，以傳遞方法以及 lambda 運算式以判斷特定的陣列項目是否結束之數字的字串表示法。The following example is similar to the first, except that it passes the string array to the method along with a lambda expression that determines whether a particular array element ends with the string representation of a number. [!code-csharp[System.Array.TrueForAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.trueforall/cs/trueforall1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Array.TrueForAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.array.trueforall/vb/trueforall1.vb#1)] 在這兩種情況下，方法會傳回`false`只要遇到結尾不是數字的第一個陣列元素。In both cases, the method returns `false` as soon as it encounters the first array element that does not end in a number. 否則，它會傳回`true`後逐一查看陣列中的所有項目。Otherwise, it returns `true` after iterating all the elements in the array. > [!NOTE] > 如這兩個範例所示，在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中，不需要建立`Predicate`委派 (`Predicate(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中) 明確。As both examples show, in C# and Visual Basic, it is not necessary to create the `Predicate` delegate (`Predicate(Of String)` in Visual Basic) explicitly. 這些語言推斷正確的委派，從內容，並自動建立。These languages infer the correct delegate from context and create it automatically.
